columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the address record

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: Primary address line in original language (Greek). Often street + number.

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Secondary address line in original language (Greek) â€” apartment, building or addition.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Tertiary address line (often locality, city and postal code) in original language.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Country name in original language (Greek).

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate (numeric). May be in a local projection or raw provider units.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate (numeric). May be in a local projection or raw provider units.

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Integer code indicating geocoding result type/provider classification (e.g., point/building/approx).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding model/service used for this address.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the geocoding lookup was performed.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Geocoding confidence/score (higher = better match).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Provider identifier for the primary matched street (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Provider identifier for the secondary matched street (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Provider identifier for the matched locality (city/municipality) when available.

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code as returned by geocoding provider (text).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing Country table ID.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string sent to geocoding service (concatenated address components).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name extracted by geocoder (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number extracted by geocoder (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Secondary street name extracted by geocoder (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Secondary street number extracted by geocoder (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality/city name extracted by geocoder (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude returned by geocoder (string representation).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude returned by geocoder (string representation).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Hierarchical area codes or region tokens returned by the geocoding provider.

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code stored as numeric where applicable.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: Administrative district/prefecture as returned by geocoder (original language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area/neighborhood returned by the geocoding model (original language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Key used by ETL/data-mart processes to indicate source record mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or dataset from which this address row originated.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from the source system used for mapping or lookups.

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character code classifying geocode result (provider-specific).

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the primary address line (Line1) was manually overridden by a user.

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: Primary address line in English (transliterated/translated). Recommended default label for displays.

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Secondary address line in English (transliterated/translated).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Tertiary address line in English (city and postal code typically).

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Country name in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Primary matched street name in English (transliterated/translated).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary matched street name in English (transliterated/translated).

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality/city name in English (transliterated/translated).

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: Administrative district/prefecture in English.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area/neighborhood in English.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the English primary address line (Line1En) was manually overridden.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number for the primary street in English representation.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Street number for the secondary street in English representation.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank record.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Official bank name or description (may be in Greek or English). Recommended display label for bank entities.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the bank is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the bank deposit detail record. Also used as a foreign key reference to SalesCollection.ID.

columns.name: BankID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the bank entity (dbo.Bank.ID). Identifies which bank received the deposit.

columns.name: BankDepositNumber
columns.description: Human-facing deposit reference or receipt number supplied by the bank. Often used for reconciliation and search.

columns.name: BankDepositDate
columns.description: Date and time when the deposit was posted at the bank. Useful for ordering and settlement timelines.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the company record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric company code used for reporting and keyed lookups (e.g., '001', '003').

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Full legal or display name of the company. Values may include localized (Greek) text or English equivalents.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for mapping to downstream data-mart or dimensional model. Currently null for all rows in sample.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the target data-mart table for the DMKey mapping. Typically used in ETL lineage; null in current data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for mapping to external systems or dimensional models. Empty in current sample.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the company is active (True) or inactive (False) in the system.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the country (primary key). Internal integer-like id represented as text in source sample.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short country code (usually ISO 2-letter code). Example values: GR, CY, CH.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Country name in the local language or local script (Greek in samples).

columns.name: CountryTelephoneCode
columns.description: International dialing prefix for the country (often with leading zeros). Example: 0030, 00357.

columns.name: TaxNumberCode
columns.description: Country prefix used in tax or VAT identifiers (e.g., EL for Greece).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Mapping key to a downstream data mart or classification (sparse, many nulls).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the downstream/master table this country maps to (where DMKey applies).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data-mart mapping; currently all null in sample.

columns.name: MinLongitude
columns.description: Minimum longitude of an approximate bounding box for the country (map units as stored).

columns.name: MinLatitude
columns.description: Minimum latitude of an approximate bounding box for the country (map units as stored).

columns.name: MaxLongitude
columns.description: Maximum longitude of an approximate bounding box for the country (map units as stored).

columns.name: MaxLatitude
columns.description: Maximum latitude of an approximate bounding box for the country (map units as stored).

columns.name: DescriptionEn
columns.description: Country name in English. Preferred human-friendly label for UI and search (e.g., Greece, Cyprus).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the credit card type (primary key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Readable name/description of the credit card type (e.g., Mastercard, Visa). Used as the display label.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the credit card type is currently active/usable.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier of the business point to which the default value applies. Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: ContentAttributeDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the content attribute definition for which this default value is defined. Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default textual value for the specified content attribute at the given business point. Up to 500 characters.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Unique name/key of the configuration parameter. Examples: 'ActivityClassifierID', 'BackOffice.LedgerYear'. Serves as the primary identifier for configuration entries.

columns.name: Parameter
columns.description: Value of the configuration parameter. Stored as text; may contain numeric values, comma separated lists or other textual configuration values.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key referencing a data model record. Often null in this dataset; reserved for linking a parameter to a numeric DM entity.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data model table related to DMKey. Mostly null in samples; used when a parameter links to a specific table in a data model.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key for referencing a data model record. Present when the link uses a string identifier rather than numeric DMKey.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the content attribute definition.

columns.name: ProductPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the product part definition this attribute definition belongs to (foreign key to dbo.ProductPartDefinition.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Friendly name of the attribute (e.g., 'Customer Name', 'Address', 'Phone'). Used as the display label for the attribute.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code representing the attribute's data type (system-defined).

columns.name: IsRequired
columns.description: Indicates whether this attribute must have a value (true = required).

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default value used when no value is supplied for this attribute.

columns.name: MinValue
columns.description: Minimum numeric value permitted for the attribute (when applicable).

columns.name: MaxValue
columns.description: Maximum numeric value permitted for the attribute (when applicable).

columns.name: IsReadonly
columns.description: Indicates whether the attribute is read-only (cannot be edited).

columns.name: VisibilityMask
columns.description: 4-character mask controlling attribute visibility in different UI contexts (encoded permissions/visibility flags).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used by data migration or mapping processes (domain-specific mapping key).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or target table used by migration/mapping processes (e.g., 'Migration').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for migration or mapping when a string key is required.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Defines the ordering or sequence for populating attributes (lower numbers fill earlier).

columns.name: MaxLength
columns.description: Maximum length (characters) allowed for text-based attribute values.

columns.name: LookupTableName
columns.description: Name of a lookup table providing allowed values for this attribute (if applicable).

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag indicating whether validation rules are enforced for this attribute.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag indicating whether keyword/keyphrase extraction or generation is enabled for this attribute.

columns.name: LookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression applied to the lookup source when retrieving allowed values for this attribute.

columns.name: DDLLookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression specifically used for drop-down list (DDL) lookup population.

columns.name: IsLocation
columns.description: Indicates whether this attribute represents a location/geo attribute.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this attribute value record.

columns.name: ContractProductID
columns.description: Reference to the contract-product context for this attribute value (foreign key to dbo.ContractProduct.ID).

columns.name: ContentAttributeDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the attribute definition that describes this value (foreign key to dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition.ID).

columns.name: ProductPartID
columns.description: Identifier of the product part instance this value is associated with (foreign key to dbo.ProductPart.ID).

columns.name: Value
columns.description: The stored value for the attribute (text). May contain free text, URLs or HTML; values observed include long descriptive Greek text and links.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence number used to order attribute values when multiple values exist for the same attribute/part.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional mapping key used by migration or data mapping processes for this value.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional table name associated with this value for migration/data mapping purposes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by migration/mapping processes for this value.

columns.name: AdvertisementID
columns.description: Optional reference to an advertisement record this attribute value is associated with (foreign key to dbo.Advertisement.ID).

columns.name: QA
columns.description: Quality assurance flag indicating whether this value has passed QA checks.

columns.name: HeaderLabel
columns.description: Optional header label associated with the value for display/grouping purposes.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the GL sequence code row.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Formatted general ledger / sequence code (hierarchical account-like code). Example: 30.00.00.0000.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the GL sequence code (display label). Typically in Greek in this dataset.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking to an external data mart or mapping table (currently null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table that DMKey refers to (currently null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key for external mapping (currently null).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this GL sequence code is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the status lookup row.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric status code used for KEPYO classification. Use this value in joins and logic to determine the status.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the KEPYO status (e.g., Greek labels). Displayed in UIs and reports.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for external data mart mapping (all null in sample).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external data mart table name for DMKey (currently empty).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used for external mapping (currently empty).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether this status value is currently active (True) or deprecated/inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate key / unique identifier for the legal form.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or abbreviation of the legal form (e.g., Î‘Î•, Î•.Î .Î•., O.E.). Used as the display label for the legal form.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used by an upstream/legacy data model or ETL process to map this legal form to a dimension (often used for migration or lookups). Nullable.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or dimension table that provided the DMKey/DMCharKey mapping (e.g., CM11D_CompanyLegalForms). Helps trace ETL source.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from an upstream data model. Currently all null in samples; reserved for string-based mapping keys.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the geo area group.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Optional short code for the geo area group. May be blank for many rows.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the geo area group (e.g., 'Dummy Group', '0-9'). Primary display label for the entity.

columns.name: ParentGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Reference to the parent geo area group (self-referential FK). Used to build hierarchical groupings. Nullable when group has no parent.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used by upstream data model or ETL for classification or mapping purposes. Nullable.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/table in the data model that provided DMKey values (e.g., 'HD11E_Sections', 'Migration').

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from an upstream data model. Samples show this column unused (all null).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the geo area group is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version identifier for the geography model used for this group. Nullable and sparsely populated.

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Identifier of a broader geographic area. Foreign key to dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp.BroaderAreaID. Nullable when not assigned.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the heading (primary key). Values are integers stored as text in source samples.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code for the heading (business classification code). Many rows have a 7-character numeric code or 'None'. Useful for lookups and joins.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Primary (Greek) description of the heading. This is the human-readable label shown to users and used for display and navigation.

columns.name: ParentHeadingID
columns.description: Reference to parent heading (hierarchical relationship). Null for top-level headings.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key indicating origin or domain mapping (used by data migration or master data management). Low cardinality (few distinct values).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or system that provided the heading row (metadata). Useful for lineage/tracing.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from source system (seldom populated).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the heading is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: DescriptionEN
columns.description: English translation of the heading description. Many rows are null â€” used as an alternate display label when available.

columns.name: IsThematicModule
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the heading belongs to a thematic module (business grouping).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the section (primary key). Small integer values (1..n).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the section (often Greek, occasionally English). Used as the primary display label.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Metadata numeric key reserved for data migration or master data mapping. Column appears to be unused (nulls).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source table name from upstream system (metadata). Column appears to be unused (nulls).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key from the source system (metadata). Column appears to be unused (nulls).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the section is currently active (True) or retired/inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the medium

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code used to reference the medium

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the medium (display label)

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer descriptive text about the medium

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the medium record was created

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the record

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the record was last modified (if any)

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account that last modified the record (if any)

columns.name: GeographicalDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to GeographicalDefinition (defines geographic scope for this medium)

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the medium is active (true) or inactive (false)

columns.name: MediumKindID
columns.description: Reference to MediumKind (categorizes the medium at a sub-type level)

columns.name: MediumTypeID
columns.description: Reference to MediumType (broad classification of medium)

columns.name: CompanyID
columns.description: Reference to Company that owns or manages this medium

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy / data-mart numeric key (nullable). Used for external DW mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data-mart table this record maps to (nullable)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Legacy / data-mart character key (nullable). Used for external DW mapping.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the medium kind

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description/name of the medium kind

columns.name: MediumTypeID
columns.description: Reference to MediumType (associates this kind with a broader medium type)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy / data-mart numeric key (nullable). Used for external DW mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data-mart table this record maps to (nullable)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Legacy / data-mart character key (nullable). Used for external DW mapping.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the medium type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly name/description of the medium type (e.g., Internet, Print).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy numeric key used by a data migration or external system (mostly empty).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/legacy table referenced by data migration processes (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Legacy composite/string key used for data-migration or cross-reference (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the specific version/edition of a medium.

columns.name: MediumID
columns.description: Reference to the parent Medium (dbo.Medium.ID). Links this version to the Medium master record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or numeric code that identifies the version (business code).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Business name of the medium version (e.g., BUSINESS TO BUSINESS). Used as the primary display label.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description of the medium version, for display and reporting.

columns.name: Year
columns.description: Year associated with this version (often a 2-digit or business-year code).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this medium version record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this medium version record was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the record.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this medium version is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: ImportContractsStartDate
columns.description: Start date used when importing contracts for this medium version.

columns.name: ImportContractsEndDate
columns.description: End date used when importing contracts for this medium version.

columns.name: SalesEndDate
columns.description: Date when sales for this version ended (nullable).

columns.name: ChangesCompletionDate
columns.description: Date when planned changes for this version were completed.

columns.name: PublishDate
columns.description: Date when the medium version was published (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric data-migration key from a legacy system (mostly null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Legacy table identifier used by the migration process (example: DirectoryID-DR10_Code).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Composite/string key used by the migration process (example values: '1-14', '1-15').

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the message record (integer).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short business code for the message (string). Often used for quick lookups or mapping to external message catalogs.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: Brief, human-readable title of the message (sample values are in Greek). Used as the primary display label for the message.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Full descriptive text of the message (longer text, sample values in Greek). Explains the message content or instructions.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the payment method type (integer).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the payment method type (often in Greek). May be null for many records (high null rate). Used as the display label.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this payment method type is currently active.

columns.name: InstallmentSequence
columns.description: Comma-separated list of allowed installment counts (e.g. '1,2,3,4'). Nullable and frequently empty; represents available installment options for this payment method.

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentPermited
columns.description: Flag indicating whether advanced/prepaid payments are permitted for this payment method type.

columns.name: PaymentWay
columns.description: Numeric code representing the payment way/category (e.g. sample values include 1, 5). Interpreted as an enumerated type in business logic.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key used for data-migration or mapping to an external system. Mostly null in the current dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external mapping table/system used for data migration or synchronization (e.g. 'DPS2YPSPaymentMethodTypeMapping'). Frequently null.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key used for external mapping. Currently all null in samples.

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentAvailable
columns.description: Flag that indicates whether advanced payment functionality is available for this payment method type (distinct from permitted flag).

columns.name: SubscriptionPaymentMethodTypeId
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing a subscription-specific payment method type (self-referential to PaymentMethodType.ID). Often null; used to link a regular payment method type to its subscription variant.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the payment method record.

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the type of payment method. Foreign key to dbo.PaymentMethodType.ID.

columns.name: Installments
columns.description: Number of installments for the payment (e.g., 1 for a single payment).

columns.name: Interval
columns.description: Interval between installments (units depend on business rules, commonly months).

columns.name: PaymentMonth
columns.description: Optional scheduled month for the payment. Nullable when not specified.

columns.name: AdvancedPayment
columns.description: Amount paid in advance toward this payment method (monetary value).

columns.name: IsExchangeSale
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this payment is related to an exchange sale.

columns.name: PaymentPhoneAccount
columns.description: Phone/account identifier used for phone-based payments (may be empty or null).

columns.name: PaymentPhoneID
columns.description: Reference to the phone/point-of-payment record. Foreign key to dbo.PointPhone.ID.

columns.name: PaymentCreditTransactionCode
columns.description: Provider/processor credit transaction code for the payment (internal tracking).

columns.name: BillingEmailID
columns.description: Reference to the billing contact email. Foreign key to dbo.ContactEmail.ID.

columns.name: NumberOfInvoices
columns.description: Number of invoices generated for this payment method (typically 0 or more).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used by data migration processes to link migrated records back to source.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source table name used during data migration (identifies origin of the migrated row).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by data migration to identify source record (nullable).

columns.name: UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the payment month was explicitly specified by a user.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the measurement type used on price lists.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name/description of the measurement type (e.g., '100/Î¬Î´Î±', 'ÎœÎ®Î½Î±Ï‚').

columns.name: AdvertisementEndDateFactor
columns.description: Factor used when calculating advertisement end date (business-specific multiplier).

columns.name: CalculateUsingQuantity
columns.description: Flag indicating whether price calculations for this measurement type use quantity.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether this measurement type is currently active and available for use.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the pricelist item row.

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Reference to the versioned section that groups pricelist items.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Reference to the product associated with this pricelist item.

columns.name: ApplyToSection
columns.description: Boolean flag: when true the price applies to the whole section.

columns.name: ApplyToSubSection
columns.description: Boolean flag: when true the price applies to sub-sections of the section.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mapping numeric key (appears unused / all null in samples).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Data-mapping table name (appears unused / all null in samples).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Data-mapping character key (appears unused / all null in samples).

columns.name: IsInactive
columns.description: Indicator whether this pricelist item is inactive (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the pricelist item detail row.

columns.name: PricelistItemID
columns.description: Foreign key to the parent pricelist item.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Product referenced in this detail row.

columns.name: ProductPartID
columns.description: Optional reference to a product part or sub-component.

columns.name: KitID
columns.description: Optional kit identifier (samples show this column unused).

columns.name: MeasurementType
columns.description: Lookup reference indicating the measurement or pricing type (e.g., unit, weight).

columns.name: UnitAmount
columns.description: Numeric amount associated with the measurement type (decimal, e.g., price or unit quantity).

columns.name: ComplexPrice
columns.description: Serialized complex pricing rules or expression (often empty).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mapping numeric key (appears unused / all null in samples).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Data-mapping table name (appears unused / all null in samples).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Data-mapping character key (appears unused / all null in samples).

columns.name: AllowableQuantities
columns.description: Serialized list or pattern of allowable quantities for this pricing row (nullable / often empty).

columns.name: AmountsPerAllowableQuantities
columns.description: Serialized amounts corresponding to AllowableQuantities (nullable / often empty).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the product record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short product code or SKU used to identify the product (case-sensitive collation).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Humanâ€‘readable product name shown in catalogs and UI.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer text describing the product; may contain marketing or bundle details.

columns.name: IsComposite
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this product is composed of other parts (true) or is atomic (false).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the product record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the product record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the product record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the product record.

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the product type classification.

columns.name: DiscountPolicyID
columns.description: Reference to a discount policy applicable to this product (nullable).

columns.name: MinMembers
columns.description: Minimum number of members/items required when this product is used as a bundle.

columns.name: MaxMembers
columns.description: Maximum number of members/items allowed when this product is used as a bundle.

columns.name: TargetValueType
columns.description: Optional type code used together with TargetValueID to classify target value (currently unused / null).

columns.name: TargetValueID
columns.description: Optional reference to a product part or target entity used by targeting rules.

columns.name: HasOptionalMembers
columns.description: Flag indicating if the product bundle can include optional members/items.

columns.name: IsDependent
columns.description: Flag indicating if this product depends on other product(s) or context.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag; true when the product has been marked deleted but retained in the database.

columns.name: UdacID
columns.description: Reference to the UDAC (unit/activity category) associated with this product.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to media/version context for which this product record applies.

columns.name: CanvasPlanningGroupID
columns.description: Optional reference to a planning group used in canvas or campaign planning.

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Numeric code describing a product characterization / category (domain-specific).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy/data-migration key used to link to external or legacy data tables.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the legacy or external table used during data migration or ETL.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used in data migration mapping (often a version or char identifier).

columns.name: NameCIAI
columns.description: Accent- and case-insensitive variant of the Name for searches and comparisons.

columns.name: CodeCIAI
columns.description: Accent- and case-insensitive variant of the Code used for matching across locales.

columns.name: LineEditorEnabled
columns.description: Flag indicating whether line-level editor features are enabled for this product.

columns.name: MaxAllowedChanges
columns.description: Maximum number of allowed changes for the product (0 = no changes allowed).

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag controlling whether validation rules are enforced for this product.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag indicating whether automated keyphrase creation is enabled for this product.

columns.name: HasPriceRanges
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this product supports price ranges.

columns.name: IsBudgetAmountExcluded
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the product's amount should be excluded from budget calculations.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the product part definition.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code for the product part definition (locale-specific collation).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the product part definition (often localized).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer descriptive text for the product part definition.

columns.name: UdacPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the UDAC part definition associated with this part.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to the media/version context for which the part definition applies.

columns.name: SingleAppearance
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this part may appear only once within a bundle or composition.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy/data-migration numeric key used to map to external systems.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Legacy table name used in migration/ETL processes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for migration/version mapping; often equals MediumVersionID in examples.

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the editor UI type used for this part (domain-specific enumeration).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the product part record.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Reference to the parent product. Foreign key to dbo.Product.ID.

columns.name: ProductPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the part definition (metadata about this part). Foreign key to dbo.ProductPartDefinition.ID.

columns.name: IsAddon
columns.description: Indicates whether this product part is an add-on (true) or part of the base product (false).

columns.name: MinOccurence
columns.description: Minimum number of times this part may occur for the product. Typically 1.

columns.name: MaxOccurence
columns.description: Maximum allowed occurrences of this part for the product. Null or 0 may indicate unlimited in some contexts.

columns.name: PriceMode
columns.description: Code indicating how the part is priced (e.g., included, additional, per-unit). Stored as integer codes; consult business codebook for values.

columns.name: ContentAttributePermittedValues
columns.description: If defined, lists permitted values for a content attribute associated with this part. Often empty (null) in current data.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy / data-migration numeric key. Present when part rows are mapped from an external system; frequently null.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external or legacy table used for data-migration mapping. Typically null for modern records.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character/string key from a legacy or external system used in data-migration scenarios.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Determines ordering / presentation priority of parts within a product. Used as default sort for product parts.

columns.name: ColumnNames
columns.description: Optional CSV or delimited list of column names relevant to this part (metadata). Commonly null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate identifier for the product type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the product type (often includes channel or category). Used as the primary display label.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy or external-system numeric key for mapping product types; usually null.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of legacy/external table used as a source for this type mapping. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Legacy or external character key used for product type mapping; often null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for the production color.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name/description of the color (e.g., 'Black', 'Red', 'Orange'). This is the friendly label for the color.

columns.name: Cyan
columns.description: Cyan component value expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used for print/production color definitions.

columns.name: Yellow
columns.description: Yellow component value expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used for print/production color definitions.

columns.name: Magenta
columns.description: Magenta component value expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used for print/production color definitions.

columns.name: Black
columns.description: Black (Key) component value expressed as an integer percentage (0-100) used for print/production color definitions.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this color is active/available for selection in production processes.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this color is considered a default choice for new items or templates.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for the production font.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name of the font (e.g., 'UBHelveticaCondeuro'). Used as the display label for the font.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this font is active/available for selection in production processes.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this font is considered the default for new items or templates.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the ProductionCaseProduct record (unique identifier).

columns.name: CaseID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the production case (dbo.Case.ID). Identifies the case/order this product is associated with.

columns.name: PricelistItemID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the pricelist item or product definition (dbo.PricelistItem.ID). Represents which product/pricelist entry is part of the case.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Numeric key used by downstream data mart / integration processes to link or reconcile this row with external systems.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/target table used by data-mart or ETL processes. Useful for integration lineage and processing rules.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by integration or reporting processes (alternative to DMKey). Typically used when an alphanumeric identifier is required for external systems.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the workflow entry.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the production workflow (often localized). Used as the display label for the workflow.

columns.name: Output
columns.description: Short code or abbreviation representing the workflow's output/destination/category. Example values: single-letter codes or short keys.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the role

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the role (often localized)

columns.name: Permissions
columns.description: Serialized permission bitmask or string that encodes feature/access rights for this role

columns.name: MaxDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount allowed for users in this role. Stored as decimal (likely percentage or currency depending on application)

columns.name: DiscountIsFixedAmount
columns.description: Flag indicating whether MaxDiscount is a fixed monetary amount (true) or a percentage (false)

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: External data-mart integer key mapping (mostly null in sample). Used for reporting/ETL mappings

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: External data-mart table name for mapping (rarely populated)

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: External data-mart character key for mapping (rarely populated)

columns.name: ForwardFromContractChange
columns.description: Flag indicating whether items (e.g., notifications or tasks) should be forwarded when a contract changes

columns.name: ForwardInternalProduct
columns.description: Flag controlling forwarding behavior for internal product-related events

columns.name: ForwardTicketType
columns.description: Flag indicating whether tickets of certain types should be forwarded for this role

columns.name: LoginUrl
columns.description: Optional URL template or link used when a user with this role logs in (may include placeholder tokens like @userid)

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Identifier of the parent role (self-referencing hierarchy). Points to dbo.Role.ID

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the role is active and can be assigned to users

columns.name: InboxViewType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating default inbox view/type for users with this role (enumeration)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the operand (used in rule engine)

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Canonical (usually English) name of the operand/operator (e.g., EQUALS, IN)

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Localized/display text for the operand suitable for UI (sample values show Greek translations)

columns.name: OperandAsSQL
columns.description: Numeric code or mapping used to translate the operand into SQL or internal evaluation logic

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key. Unique identifier for the rule condition definition.

columns.name: RuleDefinitionID
columns.description: References the parent rule definition (dbo.RuleDefinition.ID). Associates this condition with a rule.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Short human-readable identifier for the condition. Used as the primary display label for the condition.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Localized descriptive text for the condition (often displayed to users). Appears to contain Greek language text in this dataset.

columns.name: ColumnID
columns.description: References a column definition in dbo.SQLColumn (dbo.SQLColumn.ID). Indicates which data column the condition applies to.

columns.name: ConditionType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the kind of condition (e.g., equality, range, lookup). Small set of discrete values.

columns.name: LookupTableID
columns.description: Optional reference to a lookup object/table (dbo.SQLObject.ID). Used when the condition compares against a lookup set.

columns.name: FromDefaultValue
columns.description: Optional default lower-bound or 'from' value for range-style conditions. Nullable.

columns.name: ToDefaultValue
columns.description: Optional default upper-bound or 'to' value for range-style conditions. Nullable (currently entirely null in samples).

columns.name: ConditionCategory
columns.description: Optional category/classification code for the condition. Mostly null in the observed data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key. Unique identifier for the rule definition.

columns.name: RuleType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the rule type (e.g., validation, transformation). Small set of known values.

columns.name: SourceObjectID
columns.description: References the source object in dbo.SQLObject (dbo.SQLObject.ID). Identifies the object/table the rule applies to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name for the rule. Used as the primary display label for rules.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Localized descriptive text for the rule (often displayed to users). Contains Greek text in samples.

columns.name: RuleDefinitionCategory
columns.description: Category code for the rule definition. Used to group rules into predefined categories.

columns.name: RuleEditor
columns.description: Identifier of the editor/authoring tool or user responsible for the rule. Referenced as an integer code.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Optional textual expression or serialized logic for the rule (e.g., formula or script). Mostly null in current samples.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the rule record.

columns.name: RuleCategory
columns.description: Categorization of the rule (small domain of values). Represents the business grouping or type for the rule.

columns.name: RuleContextEntityID
columns.description: Identifier of the entity/context this rule applies to (references the business entity/context).

columns.name: RuleDefinitionID
columns.description: Foreign key to the rule definition record that provides the formal definition/metadata for this rule.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short business code or mnemonic for the rule (used as the primary display label). Examples: CSS_CHANNEL_TYPEID, CSS_IN_CAMPAIGN.

columns.name: Expression
columns.description: Logical expression or textual definition used by the rule. Can contain code-like tokens, conditions, or human-readable descriptions.

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Numeric value associated with the rule, often used as a count, threshold or indicator (small integer domain).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Optional foreign key to an SQL command record that can be executed by this rule. Null indicates no associated SQL command.

columns.name: State
columns.description: Record state or status flag (for example active/inactive). Small integer enumerating lifecycle state of the rule.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Unique code that identifies the sequence generator. Used as the primary lookup key for the sequence configuration.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly description of what the sequence generator is used for (display label).

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Current numeric value of the sequence (next or current sequence number depending on implementation).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking the sequence to a specific data model record or business entity identifier.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the target table in the data model that this sequence is associated with.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key or composite key value used to associate the sequence with a non-numeric business identifier.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the SQL command.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Short internal name or code for the command (used as the default display label).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of what the command does or when to use it.

columns.name: CommandType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the command type or execution category (enumeration).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the command record was created.

columns.name: CommandCategory
columns.description: Numeric category grouping for the command (business-defined classification).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the SQL object (surrogate key).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Technical/system name of the object (e.g., CanvasStage1AddressSale). Useful for lookups and joins.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human-friendly display text for the object (used as the primary label in UIs).

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the kind of object (for example: 0 = table-like, 2 = view/other).

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Short alias or shorthand identifier for the object (useful in queries or UI shortcuts).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for this column record (unique identifier within dbo.SQLColumn).

columns.name: SQLObjectID
columns.description: Reference to the SQL object (table/view/proc) that owns this column. Foreign key to dbo.SQLObject.ID.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Logical name of the column (identifier used in the SQL object). Commonly used as the primary display label for this entity.

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Human readable or alternative text for the column; often matches Name but can hold display/description text.

columns.name: ColumnType
columns.description: SQL data type family for the column (e.g., INT, NVARCHAR).

columns.name: Length
columns.description: Declared length/size for the column when applicable (for character types or precision where relevant).

columns.name: UserDataType
columns.description: Additional column definition details such as nullability or user-defined type information (e.g., 'NOT NULL').

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Identifier for the SQL command; primary key of this table and a foreign key referencing dbo.SQLCommand.ID (represents the command that owns this free-form SQL text).

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL text associated with the SQL command (full SQL script or fragment stored as NVARCHAR). Useful for searching and display.

columns.name: SQLSelctStatementID
columns.description: Identifier of the parent SELECT statement (FK to dbo.SQLSelectStatement.SQLCommandID).

columns.name: ColumnID
columns.description: Identifier of the referenced column definition (FK to dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional alias applied to the column in the SELECT list (the name after AS).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this SELECT statement (also FK to dbo.SQLCommand.ID).

columns.name: RowsToFetch
columns.description: Optional limit on number of rows to return for this SELECT (e.g., TOP or LIMIT).

columns.name: SelectDistinct
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the SELECT uses DISTINCT to remove duplicate rows.

columns.name: IsCountSelect
columns.description: Flag indicating this SELECT is a COUNT aggregation (returns row count rather than full rows).

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL snippet or custom SELECT text associated with this statement (up to 1024 chars).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the join condition row.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Reference to the SQL command (query) this join condition belongs to. Foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL snippet that expresses the join condition or predicate. Typical content is the ON or WHERE clause fragment that defines the join.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Identifier of the SQL command (query) that includes this table source. Part of the composite primary key. Foreign key to dbo.SQLCommand.ID.

columns.name: ObjectID
columns.description: Identifier of the referenced database object (table, view, subquery object). Part of the composite primary key. Foreign key to dbo.SQLObject.ID.

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional alias assigned to the table or source in the SQL statement (e.g., 't' in FROM Table AS t). Useful for resolving references in predicates.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this join condition rule.

columns.name: SQLJoinConditionID
columns.description: Foreign key to the parent SQL join condition group (references dbo.SQLJoinCondition.ID).

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the left-side column in the join (references dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: LeftObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional SQL alias/name used in the query for the left-side object (table or derived table).

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the right-side column in the join (references dbo.SQLColumn.ID).

columns.name: RightObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional SQL alias/name used in the query for the right-side object (table or derived table).

columns.name: OperandExpression
columns.description: The expression/operator used to compare left and right columns for this rule (e.g., '=', '>', 'LIKE', or a more complex SQL expression).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the search condition.

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Foreign key to the SQL command or statement this condition belongs to (references dbo.SQLCommand.ID).

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Free-form SQL snippet representing the search condition (typically a WHERE clause fragment or predicate).

columns.name: PlaceHolderName
columns.description: Optional placeholder/parameter name used for parameterized conditions (e.g., @Status).

columns.name: Alias
columns.description: Optional user-friendly alias or short name for the search condition.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this search condition rule.

columns.name: SQLSearchConditionID
columns.description: Reference to the parent search condition that groups one or more rules.

columns.name: LeftColumnID
columns.description: Reference to the column on the left side of the rule (usually a table column).

columns.name: LeftObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional alias used for the left object/table in the SQL expression (e.g., 't1').

columns.name: RightColumnID
columns.description: Reference to the column on the right side of the rule (may be null when using literal values).

columns.name: RightObjectAlias
columns.description: Optional alias used for the right object/table in the SQL expression.

columns.name: OperandExpression
columns.description: Operator or expression used to compare left and right sides (examples: '=', '<>', 'IN', 'LIKE', 'BETWEEN').

columns.name: WhearSearchValue
columns.description: Literal or pattern value used in the WHERE clause for the rule. (Note: column name appears misspelled in source as 'WhearSearchValue'.)

columns.name: WhereSearchValueForBetween
columns.description: Secondary literal value used when the operand is BETWEEN (upper or lower bound depending on implementation).

columns.name: SQLCommandID
columns.description: Identifier of the SQL command; also a foreign key reference to the parent SQLCommand record.

columns.name: FreeSQLText
columns.description: Optional free-form SQL text for the UPDATE statement. Used to store custom or raw SQL override for the command.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of a thematic category or topic. Stored with Greek case-insensitive collation (Greek_CI_AS). Values appear to be non-null in practice (null_rate: 0.0).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Alphanumeric code associated with the heading reference. Used for categorization or mapping.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human readable description of the heading (may contain localized/Greek text).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the heading reference is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: MasterHeadingID
columns.description: Reference to the master heading entity (links this reference to the master heading table).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy numeric key used for data migration or ETL. All values appear null in the sample set.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Original table name from migration processes. Nullable and not populated in current sample.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional migration/flag string (e.g., 'HASLOWER') used during data migration or to mark special cases.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the source heading (references dbo.MasterHeading.ID).

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target (synonymous) heading (references dbo.MasterHeading.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer data-model key. Column appears unused (all null in sampled data).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of referenced data-model table (metadata). Column appears unused in sampled rows.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by data-model metadata. Column appears unused in sampled rows.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key â€” unique identifier for this print/version record.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Identifier of the related medium version (references dbo.MediumVersion.ID).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name of this print/version variation (used for display).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for data-model integration or mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional metadata column storing the name of a data-model table for integration purposes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data-model mapping or integration.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate identifier for this junction/association record. Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: MediumVersionPrintVersionID
columns.description: Foreign key to the MediumVersionPrintVersion table (references dbo.MediumVersionPrintVersion.ID). Identifies the specific medium/version/print-version involved in the association.

columns.name: VesrionSectionID
columns.description: Foreign key to the VersionSection table (references dbo.VersionSection.ID). Indicates the section within the version that is associated with the medium print version. Note: column name contains a known typo 'Vesrion' mirroring the source.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key used for downstream data-mapping or integration scenarios (data-management key).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source/target table used in data mapping or integration processes. Typically used with DMKey/DMCharKey to reference external data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for descriptive or composite mapping in integration scenarios (a string-based mapping key).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the production font.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly name or description of the font (e.g., 'UBHelveticaCondeuro'). Used as the display label for the font.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the font is active and available for production use.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this font is the default font for new productions.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate identifier for the measurement type used in price lists.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name/description of the measurement type. Field uses Greek collation in source and may contain localized labels (e.g., 'Î¤ÎµÎ¼Î¬Ï‡Î¹Î¿').

columns.name: AdvertisementEndDateFactor
columns.description: Numeric factor applied when calculating advertisement end dates or expirations for this measurement type (units depend on business rules, often months or multiplier). Typical values observed: 12, 1.

columns.name: CalculateUsingQuantity
columns.description: Flag indicating whether pricing calculations for this measurement type should consider item quantity (True/False).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the measurement type is active and available for selection in pricing and product configuration.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the production color entry.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable color name (e.g., Black, Red, Orange). Stored as NVARCHAR with Greek collation in the source.

columns.name: Cyan
columns.description: Cyan (C) component percentage of the color in CMYK representation (0-100).

columns.name: Yellow
columns.description: Yellow (Y) component percentage of the color in CMYK representation (0-100).

columns.name: Magenta
columns.description: Magenta (M) component percentage of the color in CMYK representation (0-100).

columns.name: Black
columns.description: Black (K) component percentage of the color in CMYK representation (0-100).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this color is currently active and selectable for production.

columns.name: IsDefault
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this color is considered a default option in the system.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the ProductKit row (unique row identifier).

columns.name: KitID
columns.description: Reference to the product that acts as the kit (parent product). Links to dbo.Product.ID.

columns.name: MemberID
columns.description: Reference to the product that is a member/component of the kit. Links to dbo.Product.ID.

columns.name: IsMandatory
columns.description: Indicates whether the member product is mandatory (True) or optional (False) within the kit.

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Optional link to the VersionSection that scopes where or when this kit membership applies.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional external/data-manager numeric key used for integration or legacy mapping. Many rows are null.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external/source table associated with the DMKey for integration or mapping purposes.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional string key from an external system used together with DMTable/DMKey for mapping.

columns.name: FillOrder
columns.description: Integer indicating preferred fill/display order for members within the kit (lower = earlier).

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code identifying the part definition (business code).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the part definition. Suitable as the display label for the entity.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description or explanatory text for the part definition.

columns.description: Reference to the related UdacPartDefinition (external/normalized part definition). Links to dbo.UdacPartDefinition.ID.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to the medium version that this part definition applies to (e.g., medium/catalog version). Links to dbo.MediumVersion.ID.

columns.name: SingleAppearance
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the part should appear only once (True) or may appear multiple times (False).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional external numeric key used for integration/legacy mapping (data manager key).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source/external table associated with DMKey (used for mapping/integration).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key from an external system used for mapping; often aligns with MediumVersion or other external id.

columns.name: EditorType
columns.description: Integer code representing the editor or UI type used to manage this part definition (application-specific enum).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the UDAC (product / unit of deliverable)

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Unique human-readable product code / catalog code (Greek collation)

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Display name of the UDAC / product

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Free-text description or details about the UDAC

columns.description: True if this UDAC is a composite (made of multiple parts)

columns.description: Date and time when the UDAC record was created

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the last modification

columns.name: MinMembers

columns.name: MaxMembers

columns.description: Type code for the target value (domain-specific, currently unused / null in samples)

columns.name: HasOptionalMembers
columns.description: True if the composite UDAC can include optional members

columns.name: IsDependent
columns.description: Indicates whether this UDAC depends on another entity (business-specific)

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag; true when the UDAC is marked deleted

columns.name: UdacType
columns.description: Numeric type/category code for the UDAC (small domain of values)

columns.name: NewUdacID

columns.name: CanvasPlanningGroupID
columns.description: FK -> CanvasPlanningGroup.ID. Planning/grouping reference for canvas planning (nullable)

columns.name: OldUdacCode

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Small numeric code describing characterization class for the UDAC

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data-mart / data-warehouse table associated with DMKey

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key for data-mart joins (nullable)

columns.name: LineEditorEnabled
columns.description: True when line-editor UI is enabled for this UDAC

columns.name: MaxAllowedChanges
columns.description: Maximum number of allowed changes for this UDAC (business rule)

columns.name: EnableValidationRules

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation

columns.name: HasPriceRanges
columns.description: Indicates if this UDAC supports multiple price ranges
