measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Number of contracts (row count).

measures.name: Total Final Price
measures.description: Sum of FinalPrice for contracts. Null FinalPrice rows are excluded from the sum.

measures.name: Average Final Price
measures.description: Average FinalPrice across contracts with a non-null FinalPrice.

measures.name: Total User Discount Amount
measures.description: Sum of user-applied discount amounts on contracts.

measures.name: Average User Discount Percent
measures.description: Average user discount expressed as a percentage (based on the stored UserDiscountPercent values).

measures.name: Subscription Contract Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: Active Contracts
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NULL AND State = 1 THEN ID ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Count of contracts that appear active (not cancelled and State = 1). Adjust business logic as needed for 'active' definition.

measures.name: Average Days From Created to Release
measures.description: Average number of days between contract creation and release. Rows with null ReleaseDate are excluded from the calculation.

measures.name: Percent Transferred To EBS
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToEBS IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of contracts that have been transferred to EBS (TransferDateToEBS is populated).

measures.name: Count With PDF
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PdfID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have an associated PDF document (PdfID is not null).

measures.name: LineCount
measures.description: Number of contract product lines (rows)

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts referenced by these product lines

measures.name: GrossAmount
measures.description: Sum of Price multiplied by Quantity before any discounts or alterations

measures.name: TotalExplicitDiscounts
measures.description: Sum of all discount components recorded on the line (product discount, payment discount, bundle, rules, explicit discount)

measures.name: AlteredAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of any manually altered amounts applied to contract product lines

measures.name: NetAmount
measures.expression: SUM( (Price * Quantity) - (COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0)) + COALESCE(AlteredAmount,0) )
measures.description: Net revenue impact per line: gross minus discounts plus any altered amount

measures.name: OneTimeAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts associated with lines

measures.name: OneTimeAmountAfterDiscountTotal
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts after discounts

measures.name: ExtraFeeAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of extra fee amounts recorded on lines

measures.name: AvgUnitPrice
measures.description: Average unit price across lines

measures.name: AvgQuantity
measures.description: Average quantity per line

measures.name: SubscriptionLineCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of lines marked as subscription-based

measures.name: RenewedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of lines flagged as renewed

measures.name: RenewableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of lines flagged as renewable

measures.name: InterruptedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInterruptedFromCRM = 1 OR InterruptionDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of lines that have been interrupted (flag or interruption date)

measures.name: CancelledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of lines that have a cancellation timestamp

measures.name: AverageDiscountRate
measures.expression: SUM(COALESCE(Discount,0) + COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0)) / NULLIF(SUM(Price * Quantity),0)
measures.description: Total explicit discounts divided by gross amount (ratio of discounts to gross)

measures.name: DocumentCount
measures.description: Number of document records (row count) in the ContractDocument table.

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that have one or more associated documents.

measures.name: DistinctFilenameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct filenames (trimmed of leading/trailing whitespace). Useful to identify duplicate file references.

measures.name: DocumentsWithDMCharKeyCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of documents that include a non-null DMCharKey (links into external document management identifiers).

measures.name: PercentWithDMCharKey
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of documents that include a DMCharKey (percentage of total documents).

measures.name: DistinctDocumentTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct values in ContractDocumentType that appear in the current result set.

measures.name: EarliestCreatedOn
measures.description: The earliest CreatedOn timestamp for the documents in the result set.

measures.name: LatestCreatedOn
measures.description: The most recent CreatedOn timestamp for the documents in the result set.

measures.name: OfferCount
measures.description: Total number of contract offers (one row per offer).

measures.name: DistinctTargetGroupItemValueCount
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValueID values referenced by offers.

measures.name: DistinctCreators
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created offers.

measures.name: AverageDaysBetweenCreateAndModify
measures.description: Average elapsed time in days between offer creation and last modification.

measures.name: LastModifiedOn
measures.description: Most recent modification timestamp across the offers in the current filter context.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount for the contract offer detail lines (sum of Amount). Use this to measure monetary value at the detail line level.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Total quantity associated with the contract offer detail lines.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerUnit
measures.description: Average amount per unit (TotalAmount divided by TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when total quantity is zero.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of contract offer detail rows.

measures.name: DistinctUdacCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Udac (product/asset) identifiers referenced by the detail rows.

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Total number of relationship rows (each row is one relationship between two contracts).

measures.name: DistinctRelatedContracts
measures.description: Number of unique related contracts referenced by these relationship rows.

measures.name: DistinctSourceContracts
measures.description: Number of unique source contracts that have one or more related contract entries.

measures.name: RelationshipsPerSourceContract
measures.description: Average number of related-contract links per source contract (relationship rows divided by distinct source contracts). Null when there are no source contracts.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of all collection amounts recorded (total cash/receipt amount).

measures.name: CollectionCount
measures.description: Number of collection records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average amount per collection.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Smallest collection amount in the selected set.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Largest collection amount in the selected set.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points that recorded collections.

measures.name: TransferredToERPCount
measures.description: Number of collections that have been transferred to the ERP system (nonâ€‘null TransferDateToERP).

measures.name: PercentTransferredToERP
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of collections that have been transferred to the ERP system (TransferredToERPCount / CollectionCount).

measures.name: CountByPaymentType
measures.description: Count of collections; typically used together with a PaymentType breakdown to show counts per payment type.

display.notes: PaymentType is an integer code; join to the payment-type dimension (if available) for labels. Use CollectionDate as the primary reporting date. Amount assumed to be in EUR by convention â€” verify with source system.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount recorded on receipts in this buffer.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipt records (rows) in the buffer.

measures.name: AverageReceiptAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.description: Count of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(SystemReceiptID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IsPayoff) / COUNT(SystemReceiptID) END
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount / ReceiptCount).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customer codes represented in these receipts.

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.description: Count of receipts that have an associated bank deposit number (non-null).

measures.name: CashAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentChannel = N'ÎœÎ•Î¤Î¡Î—Î¤Î‘' THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount collected via the cash payment channel (PaymentChannel = 'ÎœÎ•Î¤Î¡Î—Î¤Î‘').

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of payment-method records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: TotalInvoicesCovered
measures.description: Sum of NumberOfInvoices for these payment method records â€” represents the total invoices associated with the payment methods.

measures.name: AverageInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments configured for payment methods.

measures.name: AverageInterval
measures.description: Average interval value associated with payment method schedules (nullable where not applicable).

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types observed in the filtered context.

measures.name: PreInvoiceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreInvoice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment-method records marked as pre-invoice.

measures.name: ExchangeSaleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment-method records flagged as exchange sales.

measures.name: WithPhoneReferenceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentPhoneID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment-method records that reference a phone (PaymentPhoneID is present). Useful to track phone-based payments.

measures.name: CollectionsRecorded
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CollectionDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment-method records that have a CollectionDate recorded (indicates a collected payment).

measures.name: Association Count
measures.description: Total number of payment-method to sales-collection associations (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Sales Collections
measures.description: Number of unique sales collections represented in this table.

measures.name: Distinct Invoice Payment Methods
measures.description: Number of unique invoice payment methods represented in this table.

measures.name: PolicyCount
measures.description: Number of invoice policy records (distinct policies).

measures.name: TotalNumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Sum of the configured number of invoices across all policies.

measures.name: AvgNumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Average configured number of invoices per policy.

measures.name: TotalInstallments
measures.description: Sum of installments across all policies (installment count aggregated).

measures.name: AvgInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments per policy.

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Minimum lower-bound price (PriceFrom) defined by any policy. Nulls excluded.

measures.name: AvgPriceFrom
measures.description: Average lower-bound price (PriceFrom) across policies with a value. Nulls excluded.

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Maximum upper-bound price (PriceTo) defined by any policy. Nulls excluded.

measures.name: AvgPriceTo
measures.description: Average upper-bound price (PriceTo) across policies with a value. Nulls excluded.

measures.name: PoliciesWithPriceRangeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceFrom IS NOT NULL OR PriceTo IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of policies that define either a PriceFrom or PriceTo value.

measures.name: CurrentlyActivePolicies
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StartDate <= GETDATE() AND (EndDate IS NULL OR EndDate >= GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of policies active as of today based on StartDate/EndDate. Policies with NULL StartDate are treated as not started; NULL EndDate is treated as open-ended.

measures.name: DistinctProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced by policies (NULL product references are excluded).

display.notes: StartDate and EndDate exist but are heavily null; the CurrentlyActivePolicies measure implements an active-as-of-today check. PriceFrom/PriceTo are USD values but are frequently null â€” price aggregates exclude nulls.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount across payment method records (total money recorded in these payment methods).

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Total number of payment method records (rows).

measures.name: AvgAmount
measures.description: Average Amount per payment method record.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum recorded Amount for a payment method.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum recorded Amount for a payment method.

measures.name: PaymentsWithBankDepositCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment method records that have a bank deposit number (i.e., were deposited to a bank).

measures.name: PercentWithBankDeposit
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of payment method records that include a bank deposit number (bank-deposited payments).

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct PaymentMethodTypeIDs observed in the filtered/aggregated set.

measures.name: PaymentsWithCollectionDateCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CollectionDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment method records that have a non-null CollectionDate (date when collection was recorded).

measures.name: PercentWithCollectionDate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CollectionDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of records that include a CollectionDate.

measures.name: LinkRowCount
measures.description: Number of link rows (each row represents an association between an advanced payment method and a sales collection).

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollectionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct sales collections that have at least one associated advanced payment method.

measures.name: DistinctAdvancedPaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advanced payment methods that are associated with sales collections.

measures.name: AveragePaymentMethodsPerCollection
measures.description: Average number of advanced payment method associations per sales collection (measures multiplicity of payment methods per collection).

measures.name: PercentOfCollectionsWithAdvancedPayment
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT SalesCollectionID) * 1.0 / NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.SalesCollection), 0)
measures.description: Share of all sales collections that have one or more associated advanced payment methods. Requires SalesCollection table for denominator.

display.notes: This table is a junction (many-to-many) between advanced payment methods and sales collections. Use DistinctSalesCollectionCount when counting collections and LinkRowCount when counting associations.

measures.name: DepositCount
measures.description: Number of deposit detail records (each row in BankDepositDetail). Use this measure to count deposits in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctDepositNumbers
measures.description: Number of distinct BankDepositNumber values in the current filter context. Helpful to detect duplicates or measure unique deposit identifiers.

measures.name: EarliestDepositDate
measures.description: The earliest BankDepositDate in the current filter context.

measures.name: LatestDepositDate
measures.description: The latest BankDepositDate in the current filter context.

measures.name: DepositDateSpanDays
measures.description: Number of days between the earliest and latest deposit dates in the current filter context. Returns 0 when the range is a single day.

measures.name: AverageDepositsPerDay
measures.expression: CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(day, MIN(BankDepositDate), MAX(BankDepositDate)) = 0 THEN COUNT(ID) ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / NULLIF(DATEDIFF(day, MIN(BankDepositDate), MAX(BankDepositDate)),0) END
measures.description: Average number of deposit detail records per day across the date range in the current filter context. If the date span is zero days, returns the raw count.

display.notes: This fact table represents deposit detail rows. Use Bank (via BankID) and BankDepositDate for common slicers/axes. ID is the row-level grain.

measures.name: Check Count
measures.description: Number of check detail records (one per ID).

measures.name: Distinct Check Numbers
measures.description: Number of unique check numbers recorded.

measures.name: Distinct Publishers
measures.description: Number of distinct check publishers (beneficiaries/payees).

measures.name: Checks With Same Publisher
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSamePublisher = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of checks where the publisher matches the expected/linked publisher flag (IsSamePublisher = true).

measures.name: Percent Same Publisher
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsSamePublisher = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of checks where IsSamePublisher is true.

measures.name: Average Days From Publish To Expiration
measures.description: Average number of days between the check publish date and its expiration date. NULL publish dates are excluded from calculation.

measures.name: Minimum Days From Publish To Expiration
measures.description: Minimum number of days between publish and expiration (can be negative if expiration precedes publish).

measures.name: Maximum Days From Publish To Expiration
measures.description: Maximum number of days between publish and expiration.

measures.name: Checks Expired At Publish
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckExpirationDate < CheckPublishDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of checks whose expiration date is earlier than the publish date (potential data issues or already-expired checks).

measures.name: Checks Missing Publish Date
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckPublishDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of check records without a recorded publish date.

suggested_derived_attributes.name: CheckPublishYear
suggested_derived_attributes.description: Year part of CheckPublishDate (useful for time-based grouping).

suggested_derived_attributes.name: DaysToExpiration
suggested_derived_attributes.description: Derived integer representing days between publish and expiration for each check.

measures.name: Case Count
measures.description: Total number of cases (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: Completed Case Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: Open Case Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that are not yet completed (CompletedOn is null).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of cases that have been completed (Completed Case Count / Case Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Completion (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND CreatedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END) / 86400.0
measures.description: Average elapsed time from case creation to completion, in days. Nulls excluded (only cases with both CreatedOn and CompletedOn are considered).

measures.name: Median Time to Completion (days)
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND CreatedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END) OVER () / 86400.0
measures.description: Estimated median elapsed time from creation to completion, in days (uses continuous percentile on seconds difference).

measures.name: Distinct Initiator Count
measures.description: Number of distinct initiators who created cases.

measures.name: Unassigned Owner Case Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OwnerUser IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that do not have an assigned owner user.

measures.name: Cases with Context Entity
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContextEntityID IS NOT NULL AND ContextEntityID NOT IN (-1,0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of cases linked to a valid context entity (ContextEntityID present and not equal to sentinel values -1 or 0).

measures.name: Attachment Count
measures.description: Total number of attachment records.

measures.name: Distinct Cases Attached
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have at least one attachment.

measures.name: Distinct Tasks Attached
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks referenced by attachments (null TaskID values are ignored).

measures.name: Deleted Attachments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments marked as deleted.

measures.name: Active Attachments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments currently not marked as deleted.

measures.name: Percent Deleted
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of attachments that are deleted out of total attachments.

measures.name: IsLast Flag Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsLast = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of attachments flagged as the last version (IsLast = true).

measures.name: Earliest Attachment CreatedOn
measures.description: Oldest creation timestamp for attachments in the aggregation window.

measures.name: Latest Attachment CreatedOn
measures.description: Most recent creation timestamp for attachments in the aggregation window.

measures.name: Average Attachments per Case
measures.description: Average number of attachments per case (cases with zero attachments are not counted).

measures.name: Average Days Since Created
measures.description: Average number of days from attachment creation to now. NULL for rows without CreatedOn.

measures.name: CommentCount
measures.description: Total number of comment records (rows) in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have at least one comment.

measures.name: CommentsWithTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of comments that are linked to a task.

measures.name: PercentCommentsWithTask
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of comments that are linked to a task (0-1). Use format percentage to show as percent.

measures.name: AverageCommentLengthChars
measures.description: Average length of the comment text in characters.

measures.name: MaxCommentLengthChars
measures.description: Maximum comment text length (characters) in the aggregation context.

measures.name: MinCommentLengthChars
measures.description: Minimum comment text length (characters) in the aggregation context.

measures.name: FirstCommentDate
measures.description: Earliest comment creation timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: LastCommentDate
measures.description: Most recent comment creation timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: DistinctCommenters
measures.description: Number of distinct authors (CreatedBy) who wrote comments.

display.notes: CommentText is stored in Greek collation. Use CreatedOn for time-series analysis and CreatedBy to attribute comments to users.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (one row per task).

measures.name: Completed Task Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: Open Task Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that are not completed (CompletedOn is null).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that have been completed (Completed Task Count / Task Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Complete (minutes)
measures.description: Average elapsed time in minutes between CreatedOn and CompletedOn for completed tasks. Incomplete tasks (null CompletedOn) are ignored.

measures.name: Median Time to Complete (minutes)
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn)) OVER () / 60.0
measures.description: Median elapsed time in minutes between CreatedOn and CompletedOn for completed tasks. Uses a continuous percentile on the elapsed seconds and converts to minutes. Null CompletedOn values are ignored.

measures.name: Tasks Completed Within 7 Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(DAY, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) <= 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks completed within 7 calendar days of creation.

measures.name: SavedOn Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SavedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a SavedOn timestamp (useful for identifying tasks that reached a save/edit state).

measures.name: Distinct Task Types
measures.description: Number of distinct task types present in the filtered set.

measures.name: Log Count
measures.description: Total number of task log records (at the row grain).

measures.name: Distinct Tasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have one or more log records.

measures.name: Average Logs per Task
measures.description: Average number of log entries per distinct task (NULL if no tasks).

measures.name: First Log Time
measures.description: Earliest timestamp among the selected log records.

measures.name: Last Log Time
measures.description: Latest timestamp among the selected log records.

measures.name: Logs With Outcome
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log records that contain a non-null Outcome value.

measures.name: Outcome Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Fraction of log records that include an Outcome (0-1).

measures.name: Logs With OutcomeDate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OutcomeDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log records that contain a non-null OutcomeDate.

measures.name: Average Text Length
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Text field for the selected logs.

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Total number of task assignment records (one row per assignment).

measures.name: Distinct Tasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have at least one assignment.

measures.name: Distinct Users
measures.description: Number of distinct users referenced on assignments. Null UserID values are excluded.

measures.name: Distinct DM Entities
measures.description: Number of distinct domain dimension keys (DMKey) referenced by assignments.

measures.name: Assignments per Task (avg)
measures.description: Average number of assignments per distinct task (total assignments divided by distinct tasks).

measures.name: Percent Assignments With User
measures.description: Percentage of assignment records that reference a non-null UserID.

measures.name: Percent Assignments With Role
measures.description: Percentage of assignment records that reference a non-null RoleID.

foreign_keys.note: inferred: DMTable contains the constant 'TargetGroupItemValue', so DMKey likely references that dimension.

display.notes: No explicit date column in this table. Use Task or referenced dimensions for time-based analysis.

measures.name: TotalActions
measures.description: Total number of action log rows (each row represents a recorded action instance).

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have at least one action recorded in the log.

measures.name: ActionsOfType1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions where Action = 1 (useful when Action is an enumerated type and '1' represents a specific action).

measures.name: PctActionsType1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Percentage of all actions that are of type 1.

measures.name: AverageActionsPerTask
measures.description: Average number of actions recorded per distinct task.

measures.name: FirstActionDate
measures.description: Earliest action timestamp recorded in the current filter context.

measures.name: LastActionDate
measures.description: Most recent action timestamp recorded in the current filter context.

measures.name: ActiveDays
measures.description: Number of distinct calendar days on which actions were recorded.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (task-to-case assignments) in the TaskTarget table

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of unique tasks represented in the result set

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of unique target cases represented in the result set

measures.name: RowsWithDM
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL OR DMTable IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments that have any Dimension Mapping (DMKey, DMCharKey or DMTable) populated

measures.name: PctWithDM
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL OR DMTable IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of task-to-case assignments that include any Dimension Mapping values

measures.name: AvgAssignmentsPerTask
measures.description: Average number of case assignments per task (assignments / distinct tasks)

measures.name: Transition Count
measures.description: Total number of task transition rows (one row = one transition).

measures.name: Unique Source Task Types
measures.description: Number of distinct source task types referenced by transitions.

measures.name: Unique Target Task Types
measures.description: Number of distinct target task types referenced by transitions.

measures.name: Default Transitions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDefault = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of transitions marked as default.

measures.name: Percent Default Transitions
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsDefault = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of transitions that are default (Default Transitions / Transition Count).

measures.name: Transitions With Condition
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Condition IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Condition)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of transitions that have a non-empty Condition expression defined.

measures.name: Percent With Condition
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Condition IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Condition)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of transitions that include a Condition expression.

measures.name: Transitions Missing Source
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SourceTaskTypeID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of transitions where the SourceTaskTypeID is missing (null).

measures.name: Distinct DM Tables
measures.description: Number of distinct DMTable values referenced (technical/metadata table names).

measures.name: Latest Version
measures.description: Maximum Version value observed for these transitions (useful to filter to current definitions).

display.notes: Use SourceTaskTypeID and TargetTaskTypeID to join to task type dimension for friendly names. Condition contains rule expressions (often XAML) and may require parsing for human-readable logic.

measures.name: Ticket Count
measures.description: Number of ticket records (one per ticket ID)

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the filtered ticket set

measures.name: Completed Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not null)

measures.name: Open Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets without a completion timestamp (still open)

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of tickets that have been completed (CompletedOn populated) as a percentage of all tickets

measures.name: Average Resolution Time (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days between ticket creation and completion for completed tickets

measures.name: Average Resolution Time (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(hour, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of hours between ticket creation and completion for completed tickets

measures.name: Successful Tickets (Result = 1)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets where the Result flag equals 1 (indicative of success in this dataset)

measures.name: Need Evaluation Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets flagged as needing evaluation

measures.name: Need Supervisor Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedSupervisor = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets flagged as requiring supervisor involvement

measures.name: Average Time to Receive (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ReceivedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, ReceivedOn) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days between ticket creation and the received timestamp (ReceivedOn). Nulls ignored.

measures.name: TotalResults
measures.description: Total number of ticket task result rows.

measures.name: UniqueTickets
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets represented in this result set.

measures.name: UniqueTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in this result set.

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results flagged as successful (Result = 1).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of results that are successful. Calculated as SuccessCount / TotalResults.

measures.name: PendingReviewCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingReview = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results currently marked as pending review.

measures.name: PerformedCount
measures.description: Count of results that have a PerformedOn timestamp (i.e., actions actually performed).

measures.name: FirstPerformedOn
measures.description: Earliest PerformedOn timestamp in the aggregation (first action time).

measures.name: LastPerformedOn
measures.description: Most recent PerformedOn timestamp in the aggregation (last action time).

measures.name: ResultCommCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results that involved a communication (ResultComm = true).

measures.name: ResultCommRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of results that involved a communication.

measures.name: ResultCustomerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results that were marked as resulting from customer action/confirmation.

measures.name: ResultCustomerRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of results marked as customer-driven.

measures.name: AverageResultsPerTicket
measures.description: Average number of task results per ticket.

measures.name: CommunicationCount
measures.description: Total number of communication records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: NonEmptyCommunicationCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CommunicationText IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(CommunicationText)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of communication records that contain non-empty text.

measures.name: UniqueTicketCount
measures.description: Count of distinct tickets that have at least one communication record (distinct TicketID).

measures.name: TotalCharacters
measures.description: Total number of characters across all CommunicationText values (NULLs contribute 0).

measures.name: AverageCharactersPerCommunication
measures.description: Average number of characters per communication record (averages over rows, NULLs counted as NULL in AVG semantics).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of history records (rows) in the TicketAdvertisementHistory table.

measures.name: DistinctTicketCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets referenced in the history records.

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced in the history records.

measures.name: TaskAssociationCount
measures.description: Count of history records that are associated with a task (TaskID is not null).

measures.name: WorkDoneInProductionCount
measures.description: Number of history records where work was done in production (IsWorkDoneInProduction = true).

measures.name: WorkDoneInProductionRate
measures.description: Share of history records where work was done in production (WorkDoneInProductionCount / RecordCount).

measures.name: AdvertisementsPerTicket
measures.description: Average number of advertisement history records per distinct ticket.

measures.name: BucketCount
measures.description: Number of campaign bucket rows (unique buckets)

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of reported total amounts for the bucket (includes XOGR, Website, PPC, Print where populated)

measures.name: XOGRAmount
measures.description: Sum of XOGRAmount across buckets

measures.name: WebSiteAmount
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount across buckets

measures.name: PPCAmount
measures.description: Sum of PPC amount (pay-per-click) across buckets

measures.name: PrintAmount
measures.description: Sum of print-related spend across buckets

measures.name: TargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Sum of system-calculated targeting amount for the bucket

measures.name: TargetingAmountByUser
measures.description: Sum of manually-entered targeting amounts by users (many rows are null)

measures.name: AvgTargetingPerBucket
measures.description: Average calculated targeting amount per bucket

measures.name: MaxTargetingPerBucket
measures.description: Maximum calculated targeting amount found in a single bucket

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Count of distinct business points (stores/locations) represented in the selected set

measures.name: SumScoreTotal
measures.description: Sum of ScoreTotal across buckets (interpreted as score points)

measures.name: AvgScoreTotal
measures.description: Average ScoreTotal per bucket (useful to compare bucket quality)

measures.name: AvgScoreDifferenceToAvg
measures.description: Average difference of the bucket score versus campaign average (positive means above average)

measures.name: PercentBucketsWithUserTargeting
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN TargetingAmountByUser IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percent of buckets where a user-entered targeting amount exists

display.notes: Common analyses look at active buckets (ItemStatus=1) and working buckets (WorkingStatus=1). Use FirstCustomerExpirationMonth as the primary time dimension for trend views.

measures.name: Upload Count
measures.description: Number of file upload records (rows) in the selected scope

measures.name: Distinct File Names
measures.description: Number of distinct file names uploaded in the selected scope

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns associated with uploads in the selected scope

measures.name: First Upload Timestamp
measures.description: Earliest upload timestamp in the selected scope

measures.name: Last Upload Timestamp
measures.description: Most recent upload timestamp in the selected scope

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of records (rows) in the detail table

measures.name: TotalAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of TotalAmount across records

measures.name: PrintAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of PrintAmount (printed media spend)

measures.name: PPCAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of PPCAmount (pay-per-click spend)

measures.name: XOGRAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of XOGRAmount (other specified channel spend)

measures.name: WebSiteAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount (website-related spend)

measures.name: AvgTotalAmount_PerRecord
measures.description: Average TotalAmount per record

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points in the selection

measures.name: DistinctFiles
measures.description: Number of distinct file uploads represented

measures.name: PctWithWebsiteAmount
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN WebSiteAmount IS NOT NULL AND WebSiteAmount <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of records that include a non-zero WebSiteAmount

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign-to-business-point assignment rows. Use as a general row-count of relationships in this table.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented. Typically used when grouping by CampaignID to show how many business points a campaign targets.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented. Typically used when grouping by BusinessPointID to show how many campaigns target a business point.

measures.name: Request Count
measures.description: Total number of assignment requests (rows).

measures.name: Closed Request Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that have been closed (ClosedOn is not null).

measures.name: Open Request Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that are still open (no ClosedOn date).

measures.name: Percent Closed
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of requests that have been closed (Closed Request Count / Request Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Close (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, ClosedOn) END) / 86400.0
measures.description: Average elapsed time between request creation and closure for closed requests, expressed in days.

measures.name: Average Age (days)
measures.description: Average age of requests in days. For closed requests uses actual closed time; for open requests uses current system time.

measures.name: Distinct Requested Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen who have been requested across the selected set of requests.

measures.name: Distinct Performers
measures.description: Number of distinct performers recorded on requests (null performer values are ignored).

measures.name: Requests with Comment
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(Comment, '')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that include a non-empty comment.

measures.name: TotalAssignments
measures.description: Total number of assignment detail rows (one row per bucket involved in a request).

measures.name: Reassignments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment detail rows where a new salesman was assigned.

measures.name: PendingAssignments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment detail rows that do not yet have a new salesman assigned (still pending).

measures.name: ReassignmentRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of assignment detail rows that resulted in a reassignment to a new salesman (Reassignments / TotalAssignments).

measures.name: SegmentChanges
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignment detail rows where the segment was changed.

measures.name: SegmentChangeRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of assignment detail rows that include a segment change (SegmentChanges / TotalAssignments).

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns referenced in the selection.

measures.name: DistinctBuckets
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign buckets referenced in the selection.

measures.name: DistinctOldSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct old (previous) salesmen referenced across the selected rows.

measures.name: DistinctNewSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct new salesmen referenced across the selected rows (excludes NULLs).

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Total number of campaign-salesman assignment records (rows) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of unique salesmen assigned (distinct SalesmanID) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of unique campaigns represented (distinct CampaignID) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Average Assignments per Campaign
measures.description: Average number of salesman assignments per campaign (total assignments divided by distinct campaigns). NULL-safe to avoid division by zero.

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign-salesman assignment records (each row represents a salesman assigned to a campaign with a begin/end period).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the selected set of assignments.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmanCount
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen represented in the selected set of assignments.

measures.name: TotalAssignmentDays
measures.expression: SUM(DATEDIFF(day, BeginDate, ISNULL(EndDate, CAST(GETDATE() AS date))))
measures.description: Sum of the durations (in days) for all assignments. If EndDate is null the current date is used to compute an open assignment's duration.

measures.name: AverageAssignmentDays
measures.expression: AVG(DATEDIFF(day, BeginDate, ISNULL(EndDate, CAST(GETDATE() AS date))))
measures.description: Average duration (in days) of assignments. Null BeginDate rows are excluded by the DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: ActiveAssignmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EndDate IS NULL OR EndDate >= CAST(GETDATE() AS date) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignments that are currently active (no EndDate or EndDate in the future or today).

measures.name: ActiveAssignmentPct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN EndDate IS NULL OR EndDate >= CAST(GETDATE() AS date) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of assignments that are currently active (ActiveAssignmentCount / AssignmentCount).

measures.name: EarliestBeginDate
measures.description: Earliest BeginDate across the selected assignments.

measures.name: LatestEndDate
measures.description: Latest EndDate across the selected assignments (nulls indicate open assignments and will not be considered greater than a date).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the selected scope.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented.

measures.name: TotalSubrDiscount
measures.description: Sum of subscription-related discounts applied to records (SubrTotalAmountDiscount).

measures.name: TotalNoSubrDiscounts
measures.description: Sum of discounts for non-subscription items (NoSubrTotalAmountDiscounts).

measures.name: TotalRenewalAmount
measures.description: Total renewal amount aggregated across rows (RenewalTotalAmount).

measures.name: AvgRenewalPerBusinessPoint
measures.description: Average renewal amount per record/business point.

measures.name: BundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows marked as bundle (IsBundle = 1).

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where a payment refusal flag is set.

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records flagged as disappeared.

measures.name: SignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that have a signed date (SignedDate is not null).

measures.name: PaymentRefusalRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of records with payment refusal among all records in the aggregation. Null-safe division.

measures.name: TotalActiveDays
measures.description: Total number of calendar days between AdvBeginDateSubr and AdvEndDate across rows (nulls reduce contribution). Use with care when dates are missing.

measures.name: Target Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (targeted premises) in the set. Grain-level count; one row per campaign target item.

measures.name: Unique Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (stores) targeted by the campaign.

measures.name: Recorded Actions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionSalesmanID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of target rows where an action was recorded (ActionSalesmanID is present).

measures.name: Distinct Action Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen who performed actions on these targets.

measures.name: Action Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ActionSalesmanID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of targeted rows that have an action recorded (Recorded Actions / Target Row Count).

measures.name: Rows With Phone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targeted rows that include a phone number.

measures.name: Average Days Since Action
measures.description: Average number of days between the action timestamp and today for rows that have an ActionDateTime. Nulls are ignored by the aggregate.

measures.name: Most Recent Action Date
measures.description: Latest action timestamp recorded for the slice (useful for recency checks).

facts.name: Campaign New Loss - Salesman Customer Assignments

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Number of assignment rows (one row = one customer-businesspoint assignment to a salesman under a campaign rule).

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (business points) represented in the filtered set.

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen involved in the assignments for the filtered set.

measures.name: Average Customers per Salesman
measures.description: Average number of distinct customers (business points) assigned per salesman. NULL if there are no salesmen in the filtered set.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of rows / events in the fact table

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced by these campaign events

measures.name: UniqueRuleCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign rules that produced events

measures.name: RequestedToSuspendCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where the customer was requested to be suspended

measures.name: RequestedToResumeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToResume = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where the customer was requested to be resumed

measures.name: SuspendedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where the customer is currently suspended

measures.name: NewRecordCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsNewRecord = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events marked as new records

measures.name: ActionResultCount
measures.description: Count of events which have a non-null ActionResult

measures.name: DistinctActionResultCount
measures.description: Number of distinct ActionResult values (excludes NULL)

measures.name: DialerActionAssignedCount
measures.description: Count of events with a non-null DialerAction

measures.name: BatchAssignedCount
measures.description: Count of events associated with a batch (BatchID not null)

measures.name: SuspensionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of events where the customer is suspended

measures.name: RequestedToSuspendRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of events where suspension was requested

measures.name: BatchAssignmentRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(BatchID) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of events that are assigned to a batch

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of history records (rows) in the table

measures.name: Unique Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the selected set

measures.name: Unique Segments
measures.description: Number of distinct audience segments represented in the selected set

measures.name: Unique Creators
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created targeting history entries

measures.name: Avg Records per Campaign
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) END
measures.description: Average number of history records per distinct campaign in the selected set

measures.name: Target (sum)
measures.description: Sum of target amounts. Assumes Target is a monetary target value (adjust currency if needed).

measures.name: Target (average)
measures.description: Average target amount per row.

measures.name: Target (min)
measures.description: Minimum target amount observed.

measures.name: Target (max)
measures.description: Maximum target amount observed.

measures.name: DailyTarget (sum)
measures.description: Sum of DailyTarget amounts. Many rows are null; use with filter Target IS NOT NULL if needed.

measures.name: UserDailyTarget (sum)
measures.description: Sum of UserDailyTarget amounts. Field currently sparsely populated.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of detail rows.

measures.name: Distinct Salesman Target Count
measures.description: Number of distinct salesman-target entries referenced in this detail table.

measures.name: Target Completeness
measures.expression: 100.0 * (1 - SUM(CASE WHEN Target IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0))
measures.description: Percentage of rows where Target is populated (non-null).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign score history records (one row per creation event).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns present in the history records.

measures.name: DistinctSegmentCount
measures.description: Number of distinct segments referenced by these history records.

measures.name: UniqueCreators
measures.description: Number of distinct users (creators) who created score history entries.

measures.name: FirstRecordedOn
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp in the current aggregation.

measures.name: LastRecordedOn
measures.description: Latest CreatedOn timestamp in the current aggregation.

measures.name: ActiveDaysSpan
measures.description: Number of days between the earliest and latest record in the aggregation (0 if all on same day).

measures.name: RecordsPerActiveDay
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CAST(CreatedOn AS DATE)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST(COUNT(ID) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT CAST(CreatedOn AS DATE)) END
measures.description: Average number of history records per active day (records divided by distinct dates present).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (detail records / buckets) in the detail table.

measures.name: Distinct Buckets per Query
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign buckets represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: Sum TargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Total targeting amount calculated for the selected rows.

measures.name: Average TargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Average targeting amount calculated per bucket (ignores NULLs).

measures.name: Sum TargetingAmountByUser
measures.description: Total targeting amount entered/approved by user. Many rows are NULL; result excludes NULLs.

measures.name: Coverage Rate (TargetingAmountByUser present)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TargetingAmountByUser IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of rows where a user-provided targeting amount exists.

measures.name: Sum TotalAmount
measures.description: Total of the TotalAmount column across the selected rows.

measures.name: Average TotalAmount
measures.description: Average TotalAmount per bucket (NULLs excluded).

measures.name: Sum XOGRAmount
measures.description: Total advertising amount attributed to XO.gr across selected rows.

measures.name: Average XOGRAmount
measures.description: Average XOGRAmount per bucket (NULLs excluded).

measures.name: Sum PrintAmount
measures.description: Sum of PrintAmount (mostly NULL in the sample).

measures.name: Sum PPCAmount
measures.description: Sum of PPCAmount (mostly NULL in the sample).

measures.name: Sum WebSiteAmount
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount across rows (many NULLs expected).

measures.name: Sum ScoreTotal
measures.description: Sum of total score values across selected buckets.

measures.name: Average ScoreTotal
measures.description: Average of ScoreTotal across selected rows.

measures.name: Max ScoreTotal
measures.description: Maximum ScoreTotal in the selected set.

measures.name: Min ScoreTotal
measures.description: Minimum ScoreTotal in the selected set.

measures.name: Average ScoreMainActivity
measures.description: Average of the main activity score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreSeniority
measures.description: Average of the seniority score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreValueBillingRange
measures.description: Average of the value / billing range score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreCombinationMedium
measures.description: Average of the medium combination score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreMaxInvestmentMedium
measures.description: Average of the max-investment-by-medium score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreCombinationProduct
measures.description: Average of the product combination score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreCustomerBehavior
measures.description: Average of the customer behavior score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreSalesmanManagement
measures.description: Average of the salesman/management score component.

measures.name: Average ScoreDifferenceToAvg
measures.description: Average deviation of each bucket's score relative to the campaign average.

measures.name: Targeting Amount per Score (calculated)
measures.description: Average targeting amount calculated per total score point (NULL if total score = 0).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the pivot report

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the selected rows

measures.name: NumberOfCases
measures.description: Sum of reported cases across rows

measures.name: LossQuantity
measures.description: Total loss quantity summed across rows

measures.name: NewQuantity
measures.description: Total new quantity summed across rows

measures.name: COQuantity
measures.description: Total CO quantity summed across rows

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of LossQuantity, NewQuantity and COQuantity (total quantity across buckets)

measures.name: LossQuantityPercentage_stored
measures.description: Average of stored LossQuantityPercentage values (useful when the percentage is pre-computed at row level)

measures.name: NewQuantityPercentage_stored
measures.description: Average of stored NewQuantityPercentage values (useful when the percentage is pre-computed at row level)

measures.name: COQuantityPercentage_stored
measures.description: Average of stored COQuantityPercentage values (useful when the percentage is pre-computed at row level)

measures.name: LossQuantityShareOfTotalQuantity
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0) + COALESCE(NewQuantity,0) + COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0) + COALESCE(NewQuantity,0) + COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) END
measures.description: Computed percentage share of LossQuantity relative to the total quantity (Loss+New+CO). Preferred when you need an accurate aggregate percentage.

measures.name: NewQuantityShareOfTotalQuantity
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0) + COALESCE(NewQuantity,0) + COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(NewQuantity,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0) + COALESCE(NewQuantity,0) + COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) END
measures.description: Computed percentage share of NewQuantity relative to the total quantity (Loss+New+CO).

measures.name: COQuantityShareOfTotalQuantity
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0) + COALESCE(NewQuantity,0) + COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(LossQuantity,0) + COALESCE(NewQuantity,0) + COALESCE(COQuantity,0)) END
measures.description: Computed percentage share of COQuantity relative to the total quantity (Loss+New+CO).

measures.name: ContractAmount
measures.description: Total contract amount across rows (stored monetary value).

measures.name: SubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Total subscription amount across rows.

measures.name: RenewalAmount
measures.description: Total renewal amount across rows.

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Total non-subscription amount across rows.

measures.name: TotalContractedAmount
measures.description: Sum of all amount buckets (contract + subscription + renewal + non-subscription). Useful as a denominator for amount share calculations.

measures.name: SubscriptionAmountPercentage_stored
measures.description: Average of stored SubscriptionAmountPercentage values (row-level percentage).

measures.name: RenewalAmountPercentage_stored
measures.description: Average of stored RenewalAmountPercentage values (row-level percentage).

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage_stored
measures.description: Average of stored NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage values (row-level percentage).

measures.name: SubscriptionAmountShareOfTotalAmount
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Computed share of SubscriptionAmount relative to the total contracted amount (recommended for aggregated analysis).

measures.name: RenewalAmountShareOfTotalAmount
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Computed share of RenewalAmount relative to the total contracted amount.

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmountShareOfTotalAmount
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Computed share of NonSubscriptionAmount relative to the total contracted amount.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the report (one row per campaign-segment-salesperson record).

measures.name: TotalCustomers
measures.description: Total number of customers aggregated across the selected rows. Null customer values are ignored by SUM semantics.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of unique salespeople represented in the selected rows.

measures.name: TotalCoAmount
measures.description: Aggregate TotalCoAmount (as stored) for the selected rows. Source column likely represents a monetary amount tied to the campaign/segment.

measures.name: TotalRoCoAmount
measures.description: Aggregate TotalRoCoAmount for the selected rows. Use this to compare with TotalCoAmount (may include adjustments, returns, or alternate reporting).

measures.name: TotalNew
measures.description: Aggregate TotalNew value (new revenue or new business amount) for the selected rows.

measures.name: AverageCoPerCustomer
measures.description: Average TotalCoAmount per customer. Returns NULL when total NumberOfCustomers is zero or null.

measures.name: AverageRoCoPerCustomer
measures.description: Average TotalRoCoAmount per customer. Returns NULL when total NumberOfCustomers is zero or null.

measures.name: AverageNewPerCustomer
measures.description: Average new amount per customer. Returns NULL when total NumberOfCustomers is zero or null.

default_filters.description: Exclude rows with zero or missing customers to focus on active segments.
Exclude rows without reported monetary amounts by default.

measures.name: Total Customers Impacted (derived)
measures.expression: (SUM([LossCustomers]) + SUM([Î™ncreaseCustomers]) + SUM([ReductionCustomers]) + SUM([NoChangesCustomers]) + SUM([ROCOCustomers]) + SUM([NewCustomers]) + SUM([CICustomers]))
measures.description: Derived sum of the customer buckets recorded on the row. Use with caution â€” rows should be disjoint partitions for this to represent total customers.

measures.name: Total Amount Impact (derived)
measures.expression: (SUM([LossAmount]) + SUM([Î™ncreaseAmount]) + SUM([ReductionAmount]) + SUM([NoChangesAmount]) + SUM([ROCOAmount]) + SUM([NewAmount]) + SUM([CIAmount]))
measures.description: Derived sum of the monetary buckets recorded on the row. Use with caution; meaningful when amount buckets are mutually exclusive.

measures.expression: SUM([LossCustomers]) + SUM([Î™ncreaseCustomers]) + SUM([ReductionCustomers]) + SUM([NoChangesCustomers]) + SUM([ROCOCustomers]) + SUM([NewCustomers]) + SUM([CICustomers])
measures.description: Computed total of all categorized customers (loss + increase + reduction + no-change + ROCO + new + CI). Useful as a broad activity indicator; rows may overlap depending on classification logic.

measures.description: Sum of all visits recorded for the sales person in the target scope.

measures.description: Visits classified as CO (carry-over or campaign-specific) for the sales person.

measures.name: NewVisits
measures.description: Visits to new customers recorded by the sales person.

measures.description: Count of customers attributed as CO (carry-over or campaign-specific).

measures.name: COAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with CO customers.

measures.name: LossCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers lost compared to the baseline period.

measures.name: LossAmount
measures.description: Monetary loss associated with lost customers.

measures.name: IncreaseCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers with increased activity or spend.

measures.name: IncreaseAmount
measures.description: Monetary increase associated with customers who increased activity or spend.

measures.name: ReductionCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers with reduced activity or spend.

measures.name: ReductionAmount
measures.description: Monetary reduction associated with customers who decreased activity or spend.

measures.name: NoChangesCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers whose activity/spend did not change.

measures.name: NoChangesAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount from customers with no change in activity/spend.

measures.name: ROCOCustomers
measures.description: Count of ROCO (returning or reactivated) customers.

measures.name: ROCOAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with ROCO (returning/reactivated) customers.

measures.name: NewCustomers
measures.description: Number of newly acquired customers in the campaign segment/group.

measures.name: NewAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount attributed to newly acquired customers.

measures.name: TotalCustomers
measures.description: Total customers covered by the sales person for the campaign segment/group.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary value (sales/portfolio) for the sales person in the target scope.

measures.name: AverageVisitsPerWorkingDay
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalWorkingDays) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalVisits) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalWorkingDays) END
measures.description: Average number of visits per working day for the sales person.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalAmount) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalCustomers) END
measures.description: Average monetary amount per customer (TotalAmount / TotalCustomers).

measures.name: COCustomerShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COCustomers) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalCustomers) END
measures.description: Share of CO customers relative to total customers.

measures.name: LossCustomerShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(LossCustomers) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalCustomers) END
measures.description: Share of lost customers relative to total customers.

measures.name: IncreaseCustomerShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IncreaseCustomers) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalCustomers) END
measures.description: Share of customers with increased activity relative to total customers.

measures.name: NewCustomerShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NewCustomers) * 1.0 / SUM(TotalCustomers) END
measures.description: Share of new customers relative to total customers.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of history rows (records) in the table.

measures.name: ActiveRowCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of non-deleted (active) history rows.

measures.name: DeletedRowCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows marked as deleted.

measures.name: PctDeleted
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Percentage of rows that are marked deleted.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salespeople represented in the history snapshot.

measures.name: DistinctSupervisors
measures.description: Number of distinct supervisors represented in the history snapshot.

measures.name: DistinctManagers
measures.description: Number of distinct managers represented in the history snapshot.

measures.name: AvgAssignmentsPerSalesman
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(1) / COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) END
measures.description: Average number of history rows (segment assignments) per distinct salesman in this snapshot.

measures.name: TargetItemCount
measures.description: Number of target group items (rows) in the table.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customer names represented in the target group.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced by the target items.

measures.name: DistinctMainHeadingCount
measures.description: Number of distinct main heading IDs present in the target items.

measures.name: PhoneAvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with a non-empty phone value.

measures.name: PhoneAvailablePct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of target items that have a non-empty phone value.

measures.name: AddressCompleteCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(StreetName)) <> '' AND StreetNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(StreetNumber)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with both street name and street number populated.

measures.name: AddressCompletePct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(StreetName)) <> '' AND StreetNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(StreetNumber)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of target items that have both street name and street number populated.

measures.name: ReliabilityRedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'RED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items flagged with ReliabilityStatus = 'RED'.

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with PaymentRefusal flagged (true).

measures.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with ContinuousPaymentRefusal flagged (true).

measures.name: PrecariousnessLegalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with PrecariousnessLegal flagged (true).

measures.name: SealedCheckCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with SealedCheck flagged (true).

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items marked as disappeared.

display.notes: Use CampaignID to separate target lists. Many SourceCampaignID/CaseID fields are empty in samples; treat as optional dimensions.
