measures.name: TotalPBDContractsValue_12mo
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PBD contract value aggregated across the 12 Y01..Y12 periods

measures.name: TotalPADContractsValue_12mo
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PAD contract value aggregated across the 12 Y01..Y12 periods

measures.name: TotalIBDContractsValue_12mo
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total IBD contract value aggregated across the 12 Y01..Y12 periods

measures.name: TotalIADContractsValue_12mo
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue)

measures.name: FormsWithPPCBudget_Count

measures.description: Number of forms that supplied at least one PPC budget value (min or max)

measures.name: InfoSufficientPPC_Percent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInfoSufficientPPC = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of forms where the respondent indicated 'IsInfoSufficientPPC' = true

measures.name: Eshop_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsEshop = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of forms that marked IsEshop = true

measures.name: Eshop_Percent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsEshop = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of forms where IsEshop = true

measures.name: CatalogProduct_Percent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCatalogProduct = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of forms that indicate the product is a catalog product

measures.name: Aplh_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsAplh = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of forms that marked IsAplh = true (flag count)

measures.name: TotalProducts
measures.description: Total number of product records (rows) in the fact. When used without grouping, this is the table row count.

measures.name: ProductsPerCase
measures.description: When grouped by CaseID, yields the number of products placed on that case.

measures.name: DistinctPricelistItems
measures.description: Count of distinct pricelist items referenced by the rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: RecordsWithDmKey
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records that have a non-null DMKey. Useful to identify rows already linked to a downstream dimension mapping.

measures.name: AverageProductsPerCase
measures.description: Average number of product records per case in the current filter context. Returns NULL when there are no cases.

display.notes: Use CaseID and PricelistItemID as primary breakdowns. DMTable/DMCharKey are provided for dynamic mapping contexts and can be used to join to downstream dimension mapping logic.

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Aggregate discount value stored for advertisements

measures.name: TotalRulesDiscount
measures.description: Total discounts applied by rules logic

measures.name: CompletedChangesSum

measures.name: VerifiedCount

measures.description: Count of advertisements marked as verified

measures.name: SubscriptionBasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

measures.name: QACount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

measures.name: CanExportCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CanExport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

measures.name: DenyExtractionCount

measures.name: ActiveAdvertisementCount

measures.name: AverageMonths
measures.description: Average value of the Months field (nulls ignored)

display.notes: Most monetary fields in this table are zero in the sample data. Confirm currency assumptions (USD) for fields without explicit currency hints before heavy financial reporting.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of attribute-value rows (at the grain ID).

measures.name: FilledValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where Value is not null (attributes that have a stored value).

measures.name: FilledValuePct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows with a non-null Value (attribute coverage / fill rate).

measures.name: NullValuePct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows with null Value (complement of FilledValuePct).

measures.name: DistinctAttributeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct attribute definitions represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctValueCount
measures.description: Number of distinct non-null Value entries (unique attribute values or references).

measures.name: DistinctProductPartCount
measures.description: Number of distinct product parts associated with the attribute values in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctFreeTemplateAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct FreeTemplateAdvertisement records referenced.

measures.name: QAFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows flagged for QA (QA = true).

measures.name: HeaderLabelCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HeaderLabel IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that include a non-null HeaderLabel.

measures.name: AverageRowsPerFreeTemplate
measures.description: Average number of attribute-value rows per FreeTemplate (useful to gauge typical attribute volume per template).

default_filters.description: By default show only rows that contain a value to focus on populated attributes.

notes: Because Value is null for a large majority of rows (null_rate ~93.5%), most analyses should either filter to non-null values or use FilledValuePct/NullValuePct measures.
Value can contain localized text or file reference strings (backslash-separated paths); treat accordingly in downstream parsing.
SeqNo currently appears constant (0) in samples â€” verify if sequencing logic is used before relying on it.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Total number of membership rows (rows in this table).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Business Points referenced by these group items.

measures.name: ExcludedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExcluded = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of group items marked as excluded.

measures.name: IncludedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExcluded = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of group items not marked as excluded (active/included).

measures.name: PercentExcluded
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsExcluded = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of items in this set that are marked as excluded (ExcludedCount / ItemCount).

measures.name: GroupCount
measures.description: Number of free listing group rows (counts rows at the grain).

measures.name: DistinctVersionSectionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct VersionSectionIDs represented in the current selection.

measures.name: FinalizedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of groups that have been finalized (FinalizedOn is not null).

measures.name: FinalizedRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN FinalizedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of groups that are finalized (FinalizedCount divided by GroupCount).

measures.name: AvgDefinitionLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Definition XML stored for groups.

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceFinalized
measures.description: Average number of days elapsed since FinalizedOn. Null FinalizedOn values are ignored by DATEDIFF (only finalized rows contribute).

measures.name: Run Count
measures.description: Total number of batch runs (distinct Id).

measures.name: Completed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of batch runs marked as completed (Status = 2).

measures.name: Failed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of batch runs marked as failed or error (Status = 3).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Share of runs that completed successfully (Completed Count / Run Count).

measures.name: Average Completion Time (seconds)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn for runs that have a completion timestamp.

measures.name: Max Priority
measures.description: Maximum numeric priority value observed for batch runs.

measures.name: Min Priority
measures.description: Minimum numeric priority value observed for batch runs.

measures.name: Default Priority Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Priority = 2147483647 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that have the sentinel/default priority value (2147483647).

measures.name: Total Batches
measures.description: Total number of batch search definitions (one row per Id).

measures.name: Batches with Status = 0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches where Status = 0. Value semantics (enabled/disabled/etc.) should be confirmed against application documentation.

measures.name: Batches with Status = 1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches where Status = 1. Value semantics (enabled/disabled/etc.) should be confirmed against application documentation.

measures.name: Batches ExecutionType = 0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ExecutionType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches with ExecutionType = 0. ExecutionType mapping (e.g., scheduled/manual) should be validated with source system.

measures.name: Batches ExecutionType = 1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ExecutionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batches with ExecutionType = 1. ExecutionType mapping (e.g., scheduled/manual) should be validated with source system.

measures.name: Average Times
measures.description: Average value of Times for batches where Times is populated. Null values are excluded from the average.

measures.name: Average Frequence
measures.description: Average value of Frequence (frequency) for batches where Frequence is populated. Null values are excluded from the average.

measures.name: Percent of Batches with Times
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Times IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Share of batches that have a populated Times value.

measures.name: Distinct Creators
measures.description: Number of distinct CreatedBy user identifiers present in the dataset.

measures.name: Earliest CreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest creation timestamp among the batch records.

measures.name: Latest CreatedOn
measures.description: Most recent creation timestamp among the batch records.

measures.name: SearchCount
measures.description: Number of individual search requests (one row per search).

measures.name: TotalResultsReturned
measures.description: Total number of results returned across all searches in the selected context.

measures.name: AverageResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Average number of results returned per search.

measures.name: MaxResultsForASingleSearch
measures.description: Maximum results returned for a single search entry (useful to find outliers).

measures.name: MinResultsForASingleSearch
measures.description: Minimum results returned for a single search entry.

measures.name: DistinctSearchTexts
measures.description: Number of distinct search text values observed (measures search variety).

measures.name: ResultCount
measures.description: Number of search result rows (one row per search result).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessCount
measures.description: Number of distinct businesses found across results (distinct BusinessUniqueId).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business point IDs referenced by results.

measures.name: CurrentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results marked as current.

measures.name: PercentCurrent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of results that are current (IsCurrent = true).

measures.name: PhoneCoverage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InternationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(InternationalPhoneNumber)) <> '' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of results that include an international phone number.

measures.name: HasMultipleBusinessPointsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasMultipleBusinessPoints = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results flagged as having multiple business points.

measures.name: ComparisonStatusMatchedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ComparisonStatus = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results where ComparisonStatus = 2 (business-specific meaning: e.g., matched).

measures.name: AvgCompletenessScore
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) > 0 THEN CAST(LEFT(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) - 1) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) + 1, 10) AS FLOAT), 0) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average completeness score parsed from the 'X/Y' CompletenessScore text (expressed as X/Y). Nulls ignored. If score cannot be parsed it's excluded.

measures.name: AvgResponseSizeKB
measures.description: Average size of the JSON Response payload in kilobytes (approximate, based on string length).

display.notes: CompletenessScore is stored as text 'X/Y' â€” AvgCompletenessScore parses that pattern. Response stores rich JSON; consider extracting rating, userRatingCount or opening hours to separate dimension or measures for richer reporting.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of text records (rows) in the table.

measures.name: Distinct Text Count
measures.description: Number of unique text values across all records.

measures.name: Distinct BatchSearch Count
measures.description: Number of distinct batch searches referenced by these text records.

measures.name: Duplicate Rate
measures.description: Share of rows that are duplicates of other text values (1 - distinct_texts/rows).

measures.name: Average Text Length
measures.description: Average length of the Text field in characters.

measures.name: Maximum Text Length
measures.description: Maximum length observed for the Text field in characters.

measures.name: Minimum Text Length
measures.description: Minimum length observed for the Text field in characters.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of dialer task rows (distinct tasks) in the table.

measures.name: Pending Import Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingImport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks flagged as pending import.

measures.name: Permit Call Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PermitCall = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks where calling is permitted.

measures.name: NotFound Task Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NotFound > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks marked as not found (NotFound > 0).

measures.name: Exported Task Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BatchID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have an associated BatchID (exported).

measures.name: Distinct Source Tasks
measures.description: Number of distinct source tasks referenced by these dialer tasks.

measures.name: Distinct Current Tasks
measures.description: Number of distinct current task IDs referenced (if present).

measures.name: Avg Days Since Export
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ExportDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, ExportDate, GETDATE()) END)
measures.description: Average number of days between ExportDate and today for tasks with an ExportDate.

measures.name: Avg Days Since Last Sync
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LastSynchDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, LastSynchDate, GETDATE()) END)
measures.description: Average number of days since the last synchronization (for tasks that have LastSynchDate).

measures.name: Requires Synchronization Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequiresSynchronization = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks currently flagged as requiring synchronization.

measures.name: Calls Permitted Percentage
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN PermitCall = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percent of tasks where calling is permitted (PermitCall).

measures.name: Request Count
measures.description: Total number of dialer requests (number of rows in the log).

measures.name: Unique Tasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks associated with the requests.

measures.name: Unique Initial Users
measures.description: Number of distinct users who initiated dialer requests.

measures.name: Unique Call Results
measures.description: Number of distinct call result codes recorded in the log.

measures.name: Distinct Tokens
measures.description: Number of distinct tokens issued for requests (useful to detect duplicates or replays).

measures.name: Requests per User (average)
measures.description: Average number of requests initiated per unique user (NULL when there are no users).

measures.name: EntryCount
measures.description: Total number of dialer request log entries (row count).

measures.name: DistinctUserCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users who generated log entries.

measures.name: DistinctOperationCount
measures.description: Number of distinct operations recorded in the log.

measures.name: EntriesPerActiveUser
measures.description: Average number of log entries per distinct user in the current aggregation scope. Returns NULL when there are no users.

measures.name: EarliestEntryTimestamp
measures.description: The earliest Timestamp value among the aggregated entries.

measures.name: LatestEntryTimestamp
measures.description: The latest Timestamp value among the aggregated entries.

display.notes: Status is an integer code; consider joining a status/dimension table if available for readable labels. If a User dimension exists, join on UserID for user attributes.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of logged dialer events (one row per event)

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the selected events

measures.name: TotalRowsAffected
measures.description: Sum of the RowAffected values across events (total rows impacted)

measures.name: AvgRowsAffected
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per event

measures.name: AvgProcessingTimeSeconds
measures.description: Average processing time in seconds between the event Timestamp and CompletedOn

measures.name: P95ProcessingTimeSeconds
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATEDIFF(SECOND, Timestamp, CompletedOn)) OVER ()
measures.description: 95th percentile of processing time (seconds) between Timestamp and CompletedOn

measures.name: ErrorEventCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Text IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(Text) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events that include non-empty text (often used for error or status messages)

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events marked as success. Note: assumes Status = 1 indicates success; verify mapping for your system.

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events not marked as success (assumes Status <> 1 indicates failure or non-success states)

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of events that are successful (SuccessCount / EventCount). Assumes Status = 1 indicates success.

measures.name: AvgEventsPerBatch
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) END
measures.description: Average number of events per batch in the selected scope

measures.name: CallCount
measures.description: Total number of dialer call records (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: CompletedCalls
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls that have a finish timestamp (call completed or explicitly ended).

measures.name: InProgressOrUnfinishedCalls
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls without a finish time (still in progress or not recorded as finished).

measures.name: TotalCallDurationSeconds
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, StartedOn, FinishedOn) ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Sum of call durations in seconds for calls that have FinishedOn recorded.

measures.name: AverageCallDurationSeconds
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, StartedOn, FinishedOn) END)
measures.description: Average call duration in seconds, computed only over calls with FinishedOn.

measures.name: CompletedRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Share of calls that were completed (FinishedOn present) out of total calls.

measures.name: DistinctExternalCallIds
measures.description: Count of distinct external call identifiers parsed from Payload.CallId (useful if Dialer external id repeats across rows).

measures.name: CallsWithRecallScheduled
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.RecallDateTime') IS NOT NULL AND JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.RecallDateTime') <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls where a recall (follow-up) date/time was scheduled in the payload.

measures.name: CallsWithRecording
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.DialerRecordingID'))) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls that have a non-empty DialerRecordingID in the payload (indicates recording exists).

measures.name: CallsByPayloadResult3
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.CallResultId') = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of calls where Payload.CallResultId = 3. (Adjust or create similar measures for other result codes as needed.)

foreign_keys.description: Agent / user who initiated the call (physical FK present in source).
Derived reference: CallHistoryEntityCustomerID is available inside Payload JSON (use JSON_VALUE(Payload,'$.CallHistoryEntityCustomerID') to join). Not a physical FK in the table.
Derived reference to campaign name inside payload (JSON_VALUE(Payload,'$.RegisterCallResultCampaignName')). Consider extracting campaign to a physical column for efficient joins.

display.notes: For interactive reporting, extract common JSON fields (CallId, CallResultId, RegisterCallResultCampaignName, CallHistoryEntityCustomerID, DialerTelephoneNumber, DialerRecordingID, RecallDateTime) into dedicated columns or a parsed view to allow efficient slicing and joining. Use CompletedCalls, AverageCallDurationSeconds and CompletedRate as primary KPIs.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of history records (events) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches referenced by the events in the current filter context.

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all events (sum of RowsAffected). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: AvgRowsAffectedPerEvent
measures.description: Average RowsAffected per event.

measures.name: MaxRowsAffected
measures.description: Maximum value of RowsAffected observed in the filtered events.

measures.name: NonZeroRowsAffectedPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RowsAffected > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of events where RowsAffected was greater than zero (percentage of events with an effect).

measures.name: EventsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of events per distinct batch in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctTextCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Text messages recorded in the history events (useful to gauge message variety).

measures.name: FirstEventTime
measures.description: Earliest event timestamp in the filtered result set.

measures.name: LastEventTime
measures.description: Latest event timestamp in the filtered result set.

foreign_keys.note: Suggested reference: BatchID likely relates to a batch header table. Confirm actual reference table/name in the source model.

display.notes: Common analyses: events over time, distribution by BatchActionType/Type/EntityType, batches with the most affected rows, and percent of events that changed rows.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of recorded error-action history rows.

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct BatchIDs represented in the history (unique batches).

measures.name: DistinctActions
measures.description: Number of distinct ActionIDs observed.

measures.name: DistinctEntityTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct entity types referenced by the history rows.

measures.name: AvgActionsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of action-history rows per batch (total rows divided by distinct batches). NULL when there are no batches.

measures.name: ShareOfType8
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows whose Type = 8. (Sample data shows Type = 8 frequently; adjust value in expression to target other Type codes.)

foreign_keys.note: Likely references a Batch / import batch dimension. Confirm actual table name and cardinality.
Likely references an action definition or lookup table describing the action performed.
Likely an enumeration/lookup for entity types. Confirm table/column names.
Type appears to be a small integer code (sample = 8). Map to the appropriate lookup if available.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Number of history records (rows) in the result set.

measures.name: Distinct Batch Count
measures.description: Number of distinct batches (BatchID) represented in the records.

measures.name: Total Rows Affected
measures.description: Sum of RowsAffected across all operations â€” total number of rows touched by the recorded operations.

measures.name: Average Rows Affected
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per recorded operation.

measures.name: Maximum Rows Affected
measures.description: Largest RowsAffected value observed for an operation.

measures.name: Minimum Rows Affected
measures.description: Smallest RowsAffected value observed for an operation.

measures.name: Average Processing Time (seconds)
measures.description: Average duration in seconds from TimeStamp (start) to CompletedOn (end) for operations.

measures.name: Total Processing Time (seconds)
measures.description: Sum of processing duration in seconds for all operations in the result set.

measures.name: Success Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of operations marked as successful (Status = 1).

measures.name: Failure Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of operations not marked as successful (Status <> 1).

measures.name: Success Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of operations that are successful (Status = 1).

measures.name: ErrorCount
measures.description: Total number of post-check error records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BatchID values represented in this table.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypeCount
measures.description: Count of distinct error types encountered.

measures.name: LatestErrorDate
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent error recorded.

measures.name: EarliestErrorDate
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest error recorded.

measures.name: ErrorsPerBatch_Avg
measures.description: Average number of error records per batch (total errors divided by distinct batches).

measures.name: AverageErrorAgeDays
measures.description: Average age of the error records in days (difference between ErrorDate and current UTC date).

measures.name: PercentOfTotal_ByGroup
measures.description: Share of total errors represented by the current grouping (use when grouping by ErrorType, EntityType or BatchID). Note: uses a window aggregation and requires a SQL engine that supports SUM(...) OVER().

foreign_keys.note: Inferred relationship: BatchID likely links to a batches table that groups posted items. Original metadata did not include declared FKs.
Suggested lookup for error type metadata (description, severity).
Suggested lookup for entity type definitions (e.g., YPSToEBSCustomerData, YPSToEBSContracts).

default_filters.description: By default show the last 90 days of errors.

display.notes: Recommend adding UI-friendly labels for ErrorType and EntityType from suggested lookup tables. EntityData is XML and can be parsed into a related detail table for drill-through.

measures.name: TotalCollectionAmount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts collected on receipts.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the table.

measures.name: AverageCollectionAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt.

measures.name: MinCollectionAmount
measures.description: Minimum receipt amount.

measures.name: MaxCollectionAmount
measures.description: Maximum receipt amount.

measures.name: CompletedAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 'COMPLETED' THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount for receipts with status = COMPLETED.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID), 0)
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount / ReceiptCount).

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.description: Number of receipts with a bank deposit number (non-null BankDepositNumber).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers in the dataset (by CustomerCode).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of rows in the buffer (should equal number of customer records loaded).

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the buffer.

measures.name: Active Customers
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers currently marked as active.

measures.name: Inactive Customers
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers currently marked as inactive.

measures.name: Percent Active
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of customers marked as active (Active Customers / Total Rows).

measures.name: Customers with Alternative Code
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AlternativeCode IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(AlternativeCode)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers that have an alternative customer code populated.

measures.name: NoTaxVat Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NoTaxVat = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers flagged as 'NoTaxVat'.

measures.name: KEPYOStatus = 1 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KEPYOStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers where KEPYOStatus = 1 (special KEPYO flag).

measures.name: Distinct Tax Offices
measures.description: Number of distinct tax office codes represented by customers.

measures.name: Distinct Brand Names
measures.description: Count of unique brand names associated with customers (null/empty excluded by DISTINCT semantics).

measures.name: Last Modified (Max)
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate across all customer rows (indicates freshest record).

measures.name: AddressRows
measures.description: Total number of address bridge records (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: UniqueAddresses
measures.description: Number of distinct addresses (AddressID) represented in the buffer.

measures.name: UniqueCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers referenced by CustomerID in this buffer.

measures.name: InvoiceEmailAvailability
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN InvoiceEmail IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of address rows that contain a non-null InvoiceEmail (useful to understand electronic invoice coverage).

measures.name: Phone2Availability
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of address rows that include a secondary phone number (Phone2).

use_cases: Address completeness and contact-channel readiness (email/phone) by city and customer
Counts of unique customers and addresses for dimension population
Monitoring recently modified addresses via LastModifiedDate

measures.name: ContractCount
measures.description: Number of contract rows (count of ContractID) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBillingCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct main billing customers referenced by these contracts.

measures.name: ActiveContractCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = N'Î•ÎÎ•Î¡Î“Î—' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts whose Status indicates active (Status = 'Î•ÎÎ•Î¡Î“Î—'). Adjust condition if other status values represent active contracts.

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of ContractAlteredAmount across contracts (nullable). Source column has a currency hint of USD.

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmount_Avg
measures.description: Average ContractAlteredAmount for contracts with a non-null altered amount.

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmount_NonNullCount
measures.description: Number of contracts with a non-null ContractAlteredAmount.

measures.name: DistinctRelatedTickets
measures.description: Count of distinct related ticket ids referenced by these contracts (excludes nulls).

measures.name: ShippingAddress_PresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ShippingAddressID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have a shipping address associated.

measures.name: AvgDaysBetweenSignedAndModified
measures.description: Average number of days between SignedDate and LastModifiedDate. SignedDate and LastModifiedDate should both be populated for meaningful values.

measures.name: FirstCreatedDate
measures.description: Earliest CreatedDate in the filtered set.

measures.name: LastModifiedDate_Max
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate in the filtered set.

measures.name: LineCount
measures.description: Number of contract-line buffer rows (row count).

measures.name: NetAmount
measures.description: Total net amount for the contract line rows as recorded in the bridge buffer.

measures.name: AdvancedPayment
measures.description: Total advanced payments recorded against these contract lines.

measures.name: AlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of altered amounts (adjustments) for the lines. Mostly null in source but kept for completeness.

measures.name: TotalInvoiceQuantity
measures.description: Total number of invoices (quantity) associated with these contract lines.

measures.name: AverageInstallmentsPerInvoice
measures.description: Average number of installments per invoice across the selected contract lines.

measures.name: AverageNetPerInvoice
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(InvoiceQuantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NetAmount) / NULLIF(SUM(InvoiceQuantity),0) END
measures.description: Average net amount per invoice = SUM(NetAmount) / SUM(InvoiceQuantity). Returns null if invoice quantity is zero.

measures.name: AverageContractDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartDate and EndDate for these contract lines. Null EndDate rows are excluded by DATEDIFF.

measures.name: RenewableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract lines flagged as renewable.

display.description: Bridge buffer containing per-line contract information and monetary values (NetAmount, AdvancedPayment, AlteredAmount). Use StartDate as the primary time dimension for trend analyses.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the buffer

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of collected amounts on receipts (currency assumed EUR). Field Amount is the recorded collection amount.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerReceipt
measures.description: Average amount per receipt

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customer codes represented in the receipts

measures.name: AverageAmountPerCustomer
measures.description: Average total collected amount per customer (total amount divided by distinct customers)

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.description: Number of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1). IsPayoff is stored as integer 0/1.

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (PayoffCount divided by total receipts)

measures.name: CashAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentChannel = N'ÎœÎ•Î¤Î¡Î—Î¤Î‘' THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Sum of amounts where PaymentChannel indicates cash (Greek 'ÎœÎ•Î¤Î¡Î—Î¤Î‘'). Adjust string if other cash labels exist.

measures.name: CreditCardPaymentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardTypeID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts that have a credit card type specified (indicates a card payment). Many rows are null in this column.

measures.name: CheckPaymentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts that include a check number (indicates a check payment).

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of receipts that have a recorded bank deposit date

display.notes: CollectionDate is the recommended date dimension for time series. PaymentChannel values are in Greek (e.g. 'ÎœÎ•Î¤Î¡Î—Î¤Î‘' for cash). Many card/check related fields are sparsely populated.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of all collection amounts recorded on receipts.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the collection set.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (by MainCustomerCode) represented in the collection.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerReceipt
measures.description: Average collected amount per receipt.

measures.name: CompletedAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 'COMPLETED' THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount for receipts with status = COMPLETED.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID), 0)
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs, expressed as a percentage of total receipts.

measures.name: BankDepositCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts that have an associated bank deposit date (indicating deposit recorded).

measures.name: CashAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentChannel LIKE '%ÎœÎ•Î¤Î¡Î—Î¤Î‘%' THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total amount collected via cash payments (PaymentChannel contains the Greek term for cash).

display.notes: Use SystemReceiptID as the row grain. Amount-based measures assume EUR; confirm if another currency applies. PaymentChannel contains Greek values (e.g., ÎœÎ•Î¤Î¡Î—Î¤Î‘ for cash).

measures.name: SalesPersonRowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the result set (useful for paging/validation). At the table grain this equals number of salesperson records.

measures.name: DistinctSalesPersonCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct salesperson codes. Should match SalesPersonRowCount when Code is unique.

measures.name: ActiveSalesPersonCount
measures.description: Count of active salespeople (IsActive = 1).

measures.name: InactiveSalesPersonCount
measures.description: Count of inactive salespeople (IsActive = 0).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT_BIG(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CAST(IsActive AS INT)) / COUNT_BIG(*) END
measures.description: Share of salespeople that are active (ActiveSalesPersonCount / total).

measures.name: DistinctFullNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct FullName values â€” useful for detecting duplicate or multi-valued name entries.

measures.name: LatestModifiedDate
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate across the filtered set; useful for freshness checks.

measures.name: EarliestModifiedDate
measures.description: Earliest LastModifiedDate in the set; useful for historical range checking.

foreign_keys.description: Suggested join to canonical salesperson dimension on Code. The view contains a mapping from YPS code to EBS salesperson; link to the dimension that holds stable salesperson attributes.

measures.name: PostCheckCount
measures.description: Number of post-check records (rows) reported by the YPS -> EBS post-check process.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct error types observed in the result set (per the applied breakdowns/filters).

measures.name: DistinctEntitiesAffected
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT HASHBYTES('SHA1', CONCAT(EntityType, '|', ISNULL(CAST(EntityData AS NVARCHAR(MAX)),''))))
measures.description: Number of distinct entities affected by post-checks. Computed by hashing EntityType together with EntityData to identify unique entity instances.

measures.name: EntityDataPresentPercent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Percent of post-check rows that include non-null EntityData (indicates how often the check result contains attached XML payload).

measures.name: ErrorShareWithinEntityType
measures.description: Share of this error (or selection) among all post-checks for the same EntityType. Useful to see which errors dominate per entity category.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Number of logged events (rows) in the TimeLogger table

measures.name: TotalRowsProcessed
measures.description: Sum of RowCountVal: total rows processed/reported by the logged events

measures.name: AverageRowsPerEvent
measures.description: Average RowCountVal per logged event

measures.name: TotalDataBytes
measures.description: Total DataSize in bytes associated with the logged events

measures.name: AverageDataBytesPerEvent
measures.description: Average DataSize (bytes) per logged event

measures.name: TotalDataMB
measures.description: Total DataSize converted to megabytes (MB)

measures.name: TotalLogBytes
measures.description: Total LogSize in bytes associated with the logged events

measures.name: DistinctEventGroupCount
measures.description: Number of distinct EventGroup identifiers seen in the selected data

measures.name: EarliestEventDate
measures.description: Earliest EventDate in the result set

measures.name: LatestEventDate
measures.description: Latest EventDate in the result set

measures.name: BatchCount
measures.description: Number of archive batches (rows) in the result set

measures.name: UniqueEventGroupCount
measures.description: Number of distinct EventGroup identifiers represented

measures.name: ArchivedEventRows
measures.description: Total number of event rows archived across all batches (uses Recs field which represents archived row count per batch)

measures.name: AvgRowsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of archived event rows per batch

measures.name: MinRowsPerBatch
measures.description: Minimum archived rows observed in a single batch

measures.name: MaxRowsPerBatch
measures.description: Maximum archived rows observed in a single batch

measures.name: TotalIDSpan
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EndID >= StartID THEN EndID - StartID + 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Sum of ID spans per batch (inclusive span computed from StartID and EndID). Useful to detect gaps/overlaps vs Recs.

measures.name: TotalXmlPayloadBytes
measures.description: Total size in bytes of the XmlData payload across selected batches (uses SQL Server DATALENGTH on the XML column)

measures.name: AvgXmlPayloadBytes
measures.description: Average size in bytes of the XmlData payload per batch

measures.name: FirstEventDate
measures.description: Earliest EventDate among the selected archive batches

measures.name: LastEventDate
measures.description: Latest EventDate among the selected archive batches

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of records (rows) in the selection

measures.name: DistinctEntityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct EntityID values represented

measures.description: Number of distinct action types (Type) in the selection

measures.name: RowsPerBatch_Avg
measures.description: Average number of rows per batch (total rows divided by number of distinct batches)

measures.name: RowsPerEntity_Avg
measures.description: Average number of records per entity (how many actions/rows each EntityID has on average)

measures.name: NullEntityDataCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where EntityData is null

measures.name: EntityDataPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where EntityData contains a non-null value

measures.name: DistinctEntitiesPerRecord_Ratio
measures.description: Ratio of distinct entities to total records (higher values indicate fewer duplicate EntityID occurrences)

measures.name: LogEntryCount
measures.description: Total number of log entries (rows) in TaskLog for the current filter/aggregation.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct TaskIDs referenced by these log entries.

measures.name: OutcomeCount
measures.description: Number of log entries that have a non-null Outcome value.

measures.description: Number of log entries where Outcome is null.

measures.name: OutcomeRate
measures.description: Share of log entries that include a non-null Outcome.

measures.name: AvgLogsPerTask
measures.description: Average number of log entries per distinct Task within the current aggregation.

measures.name: MinTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest Timestamp value in the current aggregation of log entries.

measures.name: MaxTimestamp
measures.description: Latest Timestamp value in the current aggregation of log entries.

measures.name: AvgTextLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Text field for log entries. Null Text values are excluded from the average.

measures.name: DistinctOutcomeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Outcome values observed in the aggregation (null excluded).

measures.name: OutcomeDateCount
measures.description: Number of log entries with a non-null OutcomeDate.

display.notes: DMKey / DMTable / DMCharKey are present but sparsely populated; use DMTable values (when available) to determine dynamic dimension references.

measures.name: Distinct Supervisors
measures.description: Number of unique supervisors represented in the current result set.

measures.name: Total Snapshot Working Days
measures.description: Sum of SnapshotWorkingdays across the result set. Represents the aggregate working days captured by the snapshots.

measures.name: Average Snapshot Working Days
measures.description: Average SnapshotWorkingdays per snapshot row. Useful to monitor typical working-day values in snapshots.

measures.name: Min Snapshot Working Days
measures.description: Minimum SnapshotWorkingdays observed in the filtered result set.

measures.name: Max Snapshot Working Days
measures.description: Maximum SnapshotWorkingdays observed in the filtered result set.

default_filters.description: Default to the last 12 months of snapshots (relative).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the detail table

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the current result set

measures.name: SumPrintAmount
measures.description: Total printed-media spend allocated to the business points (NULLs ignored)

measures.name: SumPPCAmount
measures.description: Total pay-per-click (PPC) spend allocated to the business points (NULLs ignored)

measures.name: SumXOGRAmount
measures.description: Total XOGR spend (likely a specific budget line) across rows (NULLs ignored)

measures.name: SumWebSiteAmount
measures.description: Total website-related spend allocated to the business points (NULLs ignored)

measures.name: SumTotalAmount
measures.description: Aggregate of TotalAmount for the selected rows. Use this to measure total campaign investment recorded in this detail

measures.name: AverageTotalAmountPerRow
measures.description: Average TotalAmount per row (NULL rows excluded by AVG)

measures.name: PctRowsWithTotalAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TotalAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows that have a populated TotalAmount (useful to gauge completeness of financial data)

foreign_keys.description: Links this detail row to the parent file upload record
Suggested/typical reference to a business point dimension (if available)
Suggested reference to a salesman dimension
Suggested reference to a channel dimension
Suggested reference to a segment dimension

display.notes: Typical exploration will group by business point, product mixture, vertical grouping or salesman and filter to rows with positive TotalAmount. When joining to dimensions prefer using the suggested dimension FK references (if those dims exist).

measures.name: MarketItemCount
measures.description: Number of market-item rows (rows in the fact).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Distinct number of business points represented in the selected set.

measures.name: TotalSubscriptionDiscount
measures.description: Sum of subscription discounts recorded for the market items.

measures.name: TotalNoSubscriptionDiscounts
measures.description: Sum of discounts for non-subscription (NoSubr) items.

measures.name: TotalRenewalAmount
measures.description: Total renewal amounts aggregated across market items.

measures.name: AvgRenewalAmount
measures.description: Average renewal amount per market item (ignores NULL renewal amounts).

measures.name: SignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of market items that have a SignedDate (indicates a signed/subscribed item).

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of market items flagged with a payment refusal.

measures.name: PaymentRefusalRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of market items with payment refusal (PaymentRefusal) over total items.

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of market items flagged as disappeared.

measures.name: DisappearedRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of market items flagged as disappeared.

measures.name: IsBundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of market items marked as part of a bundle.

measures.name: IsReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of market items that are marked as released.

measures.name: IsReleasedRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of market items that are released.

measures.name: CPSubscriptionBasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of market items marked as 'CP subscription based'.

measures.name: CPRenewableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of market items flagged as renewable (IsCPRenewable).

measures.name: AverageDaysToLastSigned
measures.description: Average number of days between creation and the last signed date (NULLs excluded).

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of target group item info rows (distinct TargetGroupItemValueID).

measures.name: BalanceValue_Total
measures.description: Total current balance value across items.

measures.name: DueBalanceValue_Total
measures.description: Total due balance value across items.

measures.name: SettlementBalanceValue_Total
measures.description: Total settlement balance value across items.

measures.name: TotalPBDContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM( COALESCE(Y01PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12PBDContractsValue,0) )
measures.description: Sum of PBD contract values for all 12 period buckets (Y01..Y12).

measures.name: TotalPADContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM( COALESCE(Y01PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12PADContractsValue,0) )
measures.description: Sum of PAD contract values for all 12 period buckets (Y01..Y12).

measures.name: TotalIBDContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM( COALESCE(Y01IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12IBDContractsValue,0) )

measures.name: TotalIADContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM( COALESCE(Y01IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12IADContractsValue,0) )
measures.description: Sum of IAD contract values for all 12 period buckets (Y01..Y12).

measures.name: TotalContractsValue_AllTypes
measures.expression: SUM( COALESCE(Y01PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12PBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y01PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12PADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y01IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12IBDContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y01IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y02IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y03IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y04IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y05IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y06IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y07IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y08IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y09IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y10IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y11IADContractsValue,0) + COALESCE(Y12IADContractsValue,0) )
measures.description: Combined total of contract values across PBD, PAD, IBD and IAD buckets (Y01..Y12). Useful for overall contract exposure per item.

measures.name: TotalPBDContractsValue_AllYears
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PBD contracts value across all available Y01..Y12 columns (print/business-directory type contracts)

measures.name: TotalPADContractsValue_AllYears
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PAD contracts value across Y01..Y12 (AD-related contract values)

measures.name: TotalIBDContractsValue_AllYears
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total IBD contracts value across Y01..Y12 (internet/business-directory type contracts)

measures.name: TotalIADContractsValue_AllYears
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue)
measures.description: Total IAD contracts value across Y01..Y12 (internet AD related contract values)

measures.name: GrandTotalContractsValue
measures.expression: (SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue)) + (SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue)) + (SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue)) + (SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue))
measures.description: Grand total of contract values across PBD, PAD, IBD and IAD series for all Y01..Y12 columns

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of tasks / rows in the fact (one row per task-targetgroup-businesspoint item)

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the result set

measures.name: TotalSubscriptionDiscount
measures.description: Sum of subscription-related discounts (SubrTotalAmountDiscount)

measures.name: TotalNoSubscriptionDiscount
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription discounts (NoSubrTotalAmountDiscounts)

measures.name: TotalRenewalAmount
measures.description: Total amount related to renewals (RenewalTotalAmount)

measures.name: SubscriptionsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items flagged as subscription-based (IsCPSubscriptionBased)

measures.name: SignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items with a signed date (indicates a completed/signature event)

measures.name: AverageSubscriptionDiscountPerSubscription
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(SubrTotalAmountDiscount), NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0))
measures.description: Average subscription discount per subscription-based item (handles divide-by-zero)

measures.name: SignedRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0))
measures.description: Share of tasks that have a SignedDate (SignedCount / TaskCount)

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of tasks / rows (counts TaskID occurrences)

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (BusinessPointID) represented in the result set

measures.name: Total Offer Amount
measures.description: Sum of OfferAmount for tasks (currency assumed EUR). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Average Offer Amount
measures.description: Average OfferAmount per task (computed over non-null OfferAmount values).

measures.name: Offer Amount Count (non-null)
measures.description: Number of rows with a non-null OfferAmount

measures.name: Loss Printed - Total
measures.description: Total of LossPrintedNew (numeric indicator captured per task)

measures.name: Loss Printed - Average
measures.description: Average value of LossPrintedNew per task

measures.name: BP Identity Confirmed - Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks where the business point identity was confirmed

measures.name: Released - Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks flagged as released

measures.name: CRM Flagged - Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks marked with CRM = true

measures.name: Appointment Scheduled - Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have an appointment scheduled (AppointmentDateTime is not null)

measures.name: Recall Scheduled - Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RecallTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a recall time set (RecallTime is not null)

measures.name: Subscription Count
measures.description: Sum of IsSubscription flags (interpreted as 0/1).

measures.name: UDFValue01 Total
measures.description: Sum of UDFValue01 (user-defined numeric field).

measures.name: UDFValue02 Total
measures.description: Sum of UDFValue02 (user-defined numeric field).

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Count of tasks associated with the campaign/target/item/potential owner.

measures.name: DistinctPotentialOwnerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct potential owners in the filtered set.

measures.name: AppointmentsScheduled
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

measures.name: IdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
