measures.name: IsReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that are marked as released.

measures.name: OfferAmountTotal
measures.description: Total offered amount for the assignments (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: OfferAmountAverage
measures.description: Average offered amount per assignment (ignores null OfferAmount values).

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscription <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as subscriptions (IsSubscription treated as boolean-like integer).

measures.name: LossPrintedTotal
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values for the filtered set (aggregated integer indicator).

measures.name: UDFValue01_Average
measures.description: Average of UDFValue01 (user-defined numeric field).

measures.name: UDFValue02_Average
measures.description: Average of UDFValue02 (user-defined numeric field).

measures.name: CampaignDurationDays_Average
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days computed as difference between StartDate and EndDate. Rows with nulls will be excluded by DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: TimeToAppointmentHours_Average
measures.description: Average hours between task creation and scheduled appointment time. Nulls in AppointmentDateTime are ignored.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of task rows (one row per task ID in the view).

measures.name: Distinct Cases
measures.description: Number of distinct case records referenced by tasks.

measures.name: Active Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are not completed (CompletedOn is NULL).

measures.name: Completed Tasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a completion timestamp.

measures.name: Percent Completed
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0*SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that are completed (Completed Tasks / Task Count).

measures.name: Average Age (days)
measures.description: Average age of tasks in days. For open tasks age is computed up to now; for closed tasks age is from CreatedOn to CompletedOn.

measures.name: Median Age (days) - approximate
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, COALESCE(CompletedOn, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) OVER ()
measures.description: Approximate median task age in days (uses percentiles if supported by the SQL engine).

measures.name: Distinct Task Types
measures.description: Number of distinct task types present in the dataset.

measures.name: Distinct Actual Owners
measures.description: Number of distinct actual owners assigned to tasks.

measures.name: Tasks With Outcome
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Outcome))<>'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where an Outcome value has been recorded.

foreign_keys.description: References the case or ticket dimension (Case/Ticket).
References the task type dimension.
References the user/employee who actually owns the task.
References the potential owner user (if populated).
References the organizational unit of the actual owner.
References the organizational unit of the potential owner.
Polymorphic reference to the entity (use CaseContextEntityType together to resolve type).

display.notes: CreatedOn is the recommended date for time-series analysis. CaseContextEntityType + CaseContextEntityID are needed to resolve polymorphic entities (e.g., TICKET, TGIV).

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Number of contract records (row count).

measures.name: Active Contract Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts whose customer/business partner is marked active (C_BPIsActive = 1).

measures.name: Active Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(C_ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of contracts with an active customer/business partner (Active Contract Count divided by Contract Count).

measures.name: Signed Contract Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_Signdate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that have a sign date (C_Signdate is not null).

measures.name: Distinct Customer Count
measures.description: Number of distinct customers/business partners referenced by contracts (distinct C_BPID).

measures.name: Average Days to Sign
measures.description: Average number of days between contract creation (C_CreatedOn) and sign date (C_Signdate). Nulls are excluded from the average.

measures.name: Signed Within 30 Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_Signdate IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(day, C_CreatedOn, C_Signdate) <= 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts signed within 30 days of creation.

measures.name: Total Price
measures.description: Sum of listed prices for contract products (gross price before discounts).

measures.name: Total Discount
measures.description: Total discounts applied to contract products including rule-based discounts.

measures.name: Total Net Amount
measures.description: Net amount after subtracting all discounts from the price (revenue contribution at contract-product level).

measures.name: Average Price
measures.description: Average listed price for contract products.

measures.name: Contract Product Rows
measures.description: Number of contract-product rows (row count at the grain).

measures.name: Distinct Products
measures.description: Count of distinct product SKUs referenced by contract products in the scoped query.

measures.name: Distinct Contracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented in the data.

measures.name: Subscription Product Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: Renewable Product Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products flagged as renewable.

measures.name: Exchange Sale Count (Payment Method)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PM_IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract-product rows where the payment method marks the sale as an exchange.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (base row count)

measures.name: AdvertisementCount
measures.description: Count of distinct advertisements

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Count of distinct contract products referenced by the advertisement rows

measures.name: TotalListPrice
measures.description: Aggregate list price from the contract product level (sum of CP_Price)

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Aggregate direct discounts applied at contract product level (sum of CP_Discount)

measures.name: TotalRulesDiscount
measures.description: Aggregate rule-based discounts applied at contract product level (sum of CP_RulesDiscount)

measures.name: TotalNetPrice
measures.description: Net price after discounts at contract product level: SUM(CP_Price - CP_Discount - CP_RulesDiscount)

measures.name: AverageListPricePerContractProduct
measures.description: Average list price per contract product (AVG(CP_Price))

measures.name: AverageNetPricePerAdvertisement
measures.description: Average net price allocated to each advertisement (total net price / distinct advertisements)

measures.name: ActiveAdvertisementCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN Adv_EndDate IS NULL OR Adv_EndDate >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements that are currently active (no end date or end date in the future)

measures.name: SubscriptionAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Count of advertisements marked as subscription-based

measures.name: ContractProductIsSubscriptionCount
measures.description: Count of contract products marked as subscription-based

measures.name: ContractProductIsRenewableCount
measures.description: Count of contract products marked as renewable

measures.name: ContractProductIsRenewedCount
measures.description: Count of contract products that have been renewed

measures.name: PercentContractProductsRenewable
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(CP_ID),0)
measures.description: Share of contract products that are renewable (percentage)

measures.name: TotalAdvertisementDurationDays
measures.description: Sum of advertisement durations in days. For open advertisements (no end date) uses current timestamp as end

measures.name: AverageAdvertisementDurationDays
measures.description: Average advertisement duration in days (open ads use current timestamp)

measures.name: CountPaymentMethods
measures.description: Number of distinct payment methods referenced by advertisement/contract product rows

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the advertisement view (one row is the combination of Adv_ID and CP_ID)

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements represented in the result set

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts (C_ID) referenced by the advertisements

measures.name: GrossPrice
measures.description: Total gross price before discounts. Uses product-level price (CP_Price) when available, otherwise advertisement-level price (Adv_Price).

measures.name: TotalDiscountAmount
measures.description: Sum of explicit discounts and rules-based discounts at product or advertisement level (absolute amounts).

measures.name: NetRevenueEstimate
measures.description: Estimated net revenue after subtracting discounts from price (uses CP_Price if available, otherwise Adv_Price).

measures.name: AverageGrossPrice
measures.description: Average gross price per row (uses product-level price if present, otherwise advertisement-level price).

measures.name: AverageNetPrice
measures.description: Average net price per row after discounts.

measures.name: SubscriptionRows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(CP_IsSubscriptionBased, Adv_IsSubscriptionBased, 0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows flagged as subscription-based either at the contract-product level (CP_IsSubscriptionBased) or advertisement level (Adv_IsSubscriptionBased).

measures.name: SubscriptionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(CP_IsSubscriptionBased, Adv_IsSubscriptionBased, 0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that are subscription-based (subscription rows divided by total rows).

measures.name: RenewableRows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(CP_IsRenewable, 0) = 1 OR COALESCE(CP_IsRenewed, 0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract-product rows marked as renewable (CP_IsRenewable) or already renewed (CP_IsRenewed).

measures.name: QAFlaggedRows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(Adv_QA, 0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements flagged for QA.

measures.name: AverageActiveDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days of the advertisement window (Adv_BeginDate to Adv_EndDate). If Adv_EndDate is null, current date is used.

measures.name: ActiveAdvertiserRows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(A_BPIsActive, 0) = 1 OR COALESCE(C_BPIsActive, 0) = 1 OR COALESCE(CP_BPIsActive, 0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where any of the advertiser/business partner active flags (advertiser, contract BP, contract-product BP) are set to active.

default_filters.description: Filter to active / relevant contract-product states by default (adjust state codes to your environment)

measures.name: AttributeValueCount
measures.description: Number of attribute value records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts associated with attribute values.

measures.name: DistinctProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced by the attribute values (via contract product).

measures.name: Sum_ContractProductPrice
measures.description: Total of CP_Price across rows. CP_Price is the contract-product price associated with the attribute value.

measures.name: Sum_ContractProductDiscount
measures.description: Total of CP_Discount across rows. Represents discounts applied at the contract-product level.

measures.name: Avg_ContractProductPrice
measures.description: Average CP_Price across attribute value rows.

measures.name: SubscriptionBasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attribute value rows where the related contract-product is subscription-based.

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPartnerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attribute value rows tied to active business partners (C_BPIsActive).

measures.name: RenewalFailureCount
measures.description: Total number of renewal failure records (rows) in the view

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that experienced at least one renewal failure

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct processing batches represented in the result set

measures.name: IsInvalidCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records flagged as invalid (IsInvalid = 1)

measures.name: PercentInvalid
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of records that are flagged invalid (IsInvalid = 1) relative to total records

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_VSID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_VSID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with Invalid_Target_CP_VSID flag set

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID flag set

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID flag set

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID flag set

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID flag set

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID flag set

measures.name: Invalid_Adv_EndDate_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Adv_EndDate = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where the advertisement end date is considered invalid

measures.name: Invalid_BPIsActive_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with business partner active-state validation failures

measures.name: IsCustomerRed_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCustomerRed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where the customer is marked as 'red' (IsCustomerRed = 1)

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct error types present in the dataset

foreign_keys.description: Reference to processing batch metadata
Reference to the contract dimension
Reference to the sales person / account manager
Reference to advertisement / campaign dimension
Reference to the contract product (source product) dimension
Reference to the target contract product dimension
Reference to the advertisement product dimension
Reference to date dimension for the advertisement end date (date key should be derived from Adv_EndDate)

display.notes: Default view focuses on records flagged as invalid; for time-series analysis join Adv_EndDate to a date dimension and use DistinctBatches or DistinctContracts as appropriate.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of production tasks (one row per TaskID).

measures.name: Distinct Master Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct master cases referenced by tasks.

measures.name: Tasks With Contract (Count)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are associated with a Contract (ContractID is not NULL).

measures.name: Percent Tasks With Contract
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(TaskID)=0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(TaskID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that have a ContractID, expressed as a percentage of all tasks.

measures.name: Sum Contract Final Price
measures.description: Total of ContractFinalPrice across tasks. Currency assumed to be EUR based on source locale; validate if another currency is used in source system.

measures.name: Average Contract Final Price
measures.description: Average ContractFinalPrice for tasks with a non-null ContractFinalPrice. Currency assumed to be EUR.

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct sales people (by SalesManFullName) associated with tasks. Null/blank names are excluded from distinct count.

measures.name: Tasks per Master Case (Average)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT MasterCaseID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(TaskID) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT MasterCaseID),0) END
measures.description: Average number of tasks per master case (Task Count divided by distinct MasterCase count). Returns NULL when there are no master cases.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the master case/dossier dimension.
Reference to contract dimension (most values are null in the sample).
Reference to related ticket (if present).
Reference to employee dimension by full name (may be sparse / sometimes null).
Reference to channel dimension (few distinct values observed).

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of tasks (one row per TaskID).

measures.name: Unique Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by the tasks.

measures.name: Assigned Task Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have been assigned to an actual owner.

measures.name: Assignment Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that are assigned to an owner (Assigned Task Count / Task Count).

measures.name: Average Task Age (days)
measures.description: Average age in days from TaskCreatedOn to today for the tasks in the current filter context.

measures.name: Max Task Age (days)
measures.description: Maximum age in days (oldest task) in the current filter context.

measures.name: Open Task Count (status = 0)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks with TaskStatus = 0 (interpreted as open/active in this dataset).

measures.name: Tasks with Dynamic Description
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskDynamicDescription IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(TaskDynamicDescription)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that include a non-empty dynamic description.

display.notes: Default breakdowns should be used for interactive exploration (type, case type, sender, owner, entity). The TaskStatus filter above provides an example of focusing on common statuses; adjust as needed for business definitions of open/closed.

measures.name: RunCount
measures.description: Total number of batch run records (at the row grain).

measures.name: CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: FailedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs flagged with Status = 3 (interpreted as failure). Confirm status code mapping in source system.

measures.name: IncompleteCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that have not completed (no CompletedOn timestamp).

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Proportion of runs that completed (CompletedCount / RunCount). Returns 0 when there are no runs in the grouping.

measures.name: AvgCompletionLatencySeconds
measures.description: Average elapsed time in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn for runs with a CompletedOn timestamp. Excludes runs with null CompletedOn.

measures.name: MinCompletionLatencySeconds
measures.description: Minimum elapsed time in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn for completed runs.

measures.name: MaxCompletionLatencySeconds
measures.description: Maximum elapsed time in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn for completed runs.

measures.name: UnspecifiedPriorityCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Priority = 2147483647 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs where Priority has the 2147483647 placeholder value (commonly used to indicate unspecified or default priority).

measures.name: Searches
measures.description: Number of individual search events (rows) in the table.

measures.name: TotalResults
measures.description: Total number of results returned across all recorded searches.

measures.name: AverageResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Average number of results returned per search.

measures.name: MaxResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Maximum number of results returned for a single search.

measures.name: MinResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Minimum number of results returned for a single search.

measures.name: DistinctSearchTexts
measures.description: Number of distinct search text values (unique search phrases).

measures.name: UniqueSearchTextRatio
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT Text) * 1.0 / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Proportion of searches whose search text is unique (distinct texts divided by total searches).

measures.name: ResultCount
measures.description: Total number of search result rows (records) in the slice.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointId values returned by searches.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessUniqueIdCount
measures.description: Number of distinct external business identifiers (BusinessUniqueId) in the results.

measures.name: CurrentResultsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results marked as current (IsCurrent = true).

measures.name: PercentCurrent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of results that are current (IsCurrent).

measures.name: CountWithPhoneNumber
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InternationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LEN(RTRIM(InternationalPhoneNumber)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results that include an international phone number.

measures.name: PercentWithPhoneNumber
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN InternationalPhoneNumber IS NOT NULL AND LEN(RTRIM(InternationalPhoneNumber)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of results that include an international phone number.

measures.name: HasMultipleBusinessPointsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasMultipleBusinessPoints = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results flagged as having multiple business points.

measures.name: AverageResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Average number of results returned per individual search (aggregate across IndividualSearchId).

measures.name: AvgCompletenessScoreFraction
measures.expression: AVG(TRY_CAST(LEFT(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) - 1) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) + 1, 10) AS FLOAT), 0))
measures.description: Average completeness score expressed as a fraction (e.g. '8/9' -> 8/9). Uses NULL-safe parsing of the CompletenessScore string.

measures.name: CountResponsesContainingWebsite
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Response IS NOT NULL AND Response LIKE '%"websiteUri"%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of results whose JSON Response appears to include a websiteUri field.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of collected amounts for the collection records.

measures.name: CountCollections
measures.description: Number of collection records (rows) in the period or filter context.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average collected amount per collection record.

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts associated with the collection records.

measures.name: PercentTransferredToERP
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of collections that have been transferred to the ERP system (TransferDateToERP is populated).

measures.name: CountNotTransferred
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of collection records that have not been transferred to the ERP system.

measures.name: AverageTransferDelayDays
measures.description: Average number of days between the collection date and the ERP transfer date (calculated for rows where TransferDateToERP is populated).

measures.name: NetAmountConsideringType
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN CAST(Amount AS DECIMAL(18,2)) ELSE -CAST(Amount AS DECIMAL(18,2)) END)
measures.description: Net amount where Type=1 is considered positive collection and other Type values (e.g., refunds) are subtracted. Adjusts sign by the Type field.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (targeting records)

measures.name: TotalWorkingDays
measures.description: Sum of working days recorded for the salesperson across records

measures.name: TotalVisits
measures.description: Total number of visits (aggregated). Note: source type is DECIMAL to allow fractional reporting if used.

measures.name: COVisits
measures.description: Total CO (carry-over / change-of) visits aggregated

measures.name: NewVisits
measures.description: Total new visits recorded

measures.name: COCustomers
measures.description: Count of CO customers aggregated

measures.name: COAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with CO customers (USD)

measures.name: LossCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers lost

measures.name: LossAmount
measures.description: Monetary value lost due to lost customers (USD)

measures.name: IncreaseCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers added / increased

measures.name: IncreaseAmount
measures.description: Monetary increase from new/increased customers (USD)

measures.name: ReductionCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers with reduction in business

measures.name: ReductionAmount
measures.description: Monetary reduction amount (USD)

measures.name: NoChangesCustomers
measures.description: Count of customers with no change

measures.name: NoChangesAmount
measures.description: Monetary value for customers with no change (USD)

measures.name: ROCOCustomers
measures.description: ROCO customer count (returned / regained customers)

measures.name: ROCOAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount associated with ROCO customers (USD)

measures.name: NewCustomers
measures.description: Count of newly acquired customers

measures.name: NewAmount
measures.description: Monetary amount from newly acquired customers (USD)

measures.name: TotalCustomers
measures.description: Total customers covered in the record (aggregated)

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount for the targeted customers (USD)

measures.name: AverageVisitsPerWorkingDay
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalWorkingDays) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalVisits) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalWorkingDays),0) END
measures.description: Average number of visits per working day for the aggregated records

measures.name: NewCustomerRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NewCustomers) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of total customers that are new (NewCustomers / TotalCustomers)

measures.name: LossRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(LossCustomers) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of total customers lost (LossCustomers / TotalCustomers)

measures.name: COCustomerRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COCustomers) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) END
measures.description: Share of CO customers relative to total customers

measures.name: NetCustomerChange
measures.description: Net change in customer counts (increases minus losses)

measures.name: NetAmountChange
measures.description: Net monetary change from increases minus losses (USD)

measures.name: AverageAmountPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalAmount) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) END
measures.description: Average dollar value per customer (TotalAmount / TotalCustomers)

measures.name: Ticket Count
measures.description: Total number of tickets (rows) in the table.

measures.name: Completed Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn).

measures.name: Open Tickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets not yet completed (no CompletedOn).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / CAST(COUNT(ID) AS FLOAT) END
measures.description: Share of tickets that are completed (Completed Tickets / Ticket Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Complete (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time from CreatedOn to CompletedOn expressed in hours (only for completed tickets).

measures.name: Average Time Received-to-Complete (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ReceivedOn IS NOT NULL AND CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, ReceivedOn, CompletedOn) / 3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time from ReceivedOn to CompletedOn in hours. Null when ReceivedOn or CompletedOn is missing.

measures.name: Tickets Needing Evaluation
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets flagged as requiring evaluation (NeedEval = true).

measures.name: Tickets Requiring Supervisor
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedSupervisor = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets flagged as requiring supervisor attention (NeedSupervisor = true).

measures.name: Tickets with Customer Result
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets where the result was recorded as customer-related (ResultCustomer = true).

measures.name: Tickets with Result Communication
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that had a communication result flag set (ResultComm = true).

measures.name: Average Open Duration (days, counts ongoing as of today)
measures.description: Average number of days tickets remain open. For unresolved tickets, computes days from CreatedOn to the current timestamp.

display.notes: Prefer breaking down by BusinessPoint, TicketType and CreatedOn (date hierarchy). When analyzing completion metrics, filter to Completed Tickets (CompletedOn IS NOT NULL) to avoid skew from open tickets.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (row count) in the table.

measures.name: Completed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a CompletedOn timestamp (i.e., completed tasks).

measures.name: Open Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that do not have a CompletedOn timestamp (i.e., still open).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that are completed (Completed Count divided by Task Count). Returns null when there are no tasks.

measures.name: Average Time to Complete (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time from CreatedOn to CompletedOn for completed tasks, expressed in hours.

measures.name: Average Time to First Owner Modification (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerModifiedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, ActualOwnerModifiedOn) / 3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average time from task creation to the first recorded modification of the actual owner, in hours. Null when ActualOwnerModifiedOn is not set.

measures.name: Distinct Actual Owners
measures.description: Number of distinct ActualOwnerID values referenced by tasks (nulls are excluded).

measures.name: Tasks with Outcome Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Outcome)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a non-empty Outcome value recorded.

measures.name: Distinct Cases
measures.description: Count of distinct cases referenced by tasks (useful to understand task-to-case relationships).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of campaign bucket rows (records).

measures.name: Total Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of TotalAmount for the bucket rows. Represents the total assigned/estimated spend across mediums.

measures.name: XO.gr (sum)
measures.description: Total spend/value attributed to XO.gr medium (sum of XOGRAmount).

measures.name: Website (sum)
measures.description: Total spend/value attributed to Website medium (sum of WebSiteAmount).

measures.name: PPC (sum)
measures.description: Total spend/value attributed to PPC (pay-per-click) (sum of PPCAmount).

measures.name: Print (sum)
measures.description: Total spend/value attributed to Print (sum of PrintAmount). Often sparsely populated.

measures.name: Targeting Amount (calculated, sum)
measures.description: Sum of system-calculated targeting amounts (TargetingAmountCalculated).

measures.name: Targeting Amount (by user, sum)
measures.description: Sum of targeting amounts as entered/overridden by users (TargetingAmountByUser). May be frequently NULL.

measures.name: Average ScoreTotal
measures.description: Average of ScoreTotal across the selected bucket rows. ScoreTotal is a composite ranking score for the bucket.

measures.name: Maximum ScoreTotal
measures.description: Maximum ScoreTotal observed in the selected bucket rows.

measures.name: Sum of ScoreTotal (points)
measures.description: Sum of ScoreTotal values (useful to compute contribution of groups when combined with Row Count).

measures.name: Average Score Difference to Avg
measures.description: Average difference of each bucket's score to the campaign average (ScoreDifferenceToAvg).

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointID values in the current selection.

measures.name: Percent Working (WorkingStatus = 1)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN WorkingStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows in the selection whose WorkingStatus indicates active/working (WorkingStatus = 1).

measures.name: Percent Item Active (ItemStatus = 1)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ItemStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows with ItemStatus = 1 (typically indicates active/valid bucket items).

measures.name: MarketItemCount
measures.description: Number of rows / market items for the campaign-target-group-business point combination

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the grain (useful if rows can repeat)

measures.name: TotalSubrDiscount
measures.description: Sum of subscription-related discounts applied to items

measures.name: TotalNoSubrDiscount
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription-related discounts

measures.name: TotalRenewalAmount
measures.description: Total renewal amounts for the items

measures.name: AverageSubrDiscountPerItem
measures.description: Average subscription discount per row (NULLs are ignored in AVG)

measures.name: AverageRenewalAmountPerItem
measures.description: Average renewal amount per row

measures.name: SignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of items where a SignedDate exists (indicates signed deals)

measures.name: SubscriptionBasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of items that are subscription-based

measures.name: BundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of items flagged as bundles

measures.name: PercentReleased
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of items marked as released

measures.name: PercentPaymentRefusal
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of items with payment refusal flag

measures.name: Target Item Count
measures.description: Total number of target group items (rows) in the selection.

measures.name: Unique Customers (Code)
measures.description: Number of distinct customers identified by Code. Use when Code represents the customer identifier.

measures.name: Unique Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the target set.

measures.name: Unique Main Headings
measures.description: Number of distinct main heading categories present among the targets.

measures.name: With Phone Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND Phone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items that have at least one phone number recorded.

measures.name: Address Completeness Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL AND StreetName <> '' AND StreetNumber IS NOT NULL AND StreetNumber <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of target items with both StreetName and StreetNumber populated (basic address completeness).

measures.name: Payment Refusal Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items marked as payment refusal.

measures.name: Payment Refusal Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of targets marked as payment refusal relative to total target items.

measures.name: Disappeared Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items flagged as disappeared.

measures.name: Disappeared Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of targets flagged as disappeared.

measures.name: Precariousness (Legal) Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targets flagged for precariousness/legal status.

measures.name: Continuous Payment Refusal Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targets with continuous payment refusal flagged.

measures.name: Sealed Check Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targets flagged as having a sealed check.

measures.name: Reliability RED Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'RED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of targets whose reliability status is RED.

measures.name: Reliability RED Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'RED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of targets with reliability status RED.

measures.name: Unknown Reliability Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus IS NULL OR ReliabilityStatus = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of targets with no reliability status recorded.

display.notes: Common analysis dimensions: Campaign -> CampaignID, BusinessPoint -> BusinessPointID, MainHeadingName (text), geographic breakdowns (Prefecture / City). Use boolean flag counts and rates to assess data quality and contactability.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of target group item value records

measures.name: SumTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of TargetValue across records (numeric target assigned to the group item)

measures.name: AvgTargetValue
measures.description: Average TargetValue per record

measures.name: SumChannelTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of ChannelTargetValue (target allocated at channel level)

measures.name: SumUserTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of UserTargetValue (target allocated at user level)

measures.name: TotalVisits
measures.description: Total visits recorded for the target group items

measures.name: TotalLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew indicating printed-loss count for items

measures.name: ReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as released

measures.name: ClosedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsClosed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as closed

measures.name: TargetValuesNeedRefreshCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TargetValuesNeedRefresh = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where target values are flagged to be refreshed

measures.name: AvgPlannedDurationDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN StartDate IS NOT NULL AND EndDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, EndDate) END)
measures.description: Average planned duration in days between StartDate and EndDate (nulls excluded)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of target group item rows (distinct TargetGroupItemValueID).

measures.name: BalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of current balance values for the target group item (currency assumed EUR â€” verify).

measures.name: DueBalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of due balance amounts (outstanding amounts expected).

measures.name: SettlementBalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of settlement balance values (amounts allocated for settlement).

measures.name: TotalPBDContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PBD contract value summed across all 12 year periods (Y01..Y12).

measures.name: TotalPADContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue)
measures.description: Total PAD contract value summed across all 12 year periods (Y01..Y12).

measures.name: TotalIBDContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Total IBD contract value summed across all 12 year periods (Y01..Y12).

measures.name: TotalIADContractsValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue)
measures.description: Total IAD contract value summed across all 12 year periods (Y01..Y12).

measures.name: TotalContractValue
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue)
measures.description: Aggregate contract value across all PBD, PAD, IBD and IAD contract columns for periods Y01..Y12.

measures.name: TotalPreprintedValue_Sum
measures.description: Sum of TotalPreprintedValue column (preprinted product value).

measures.name: PrintPreprintedValue_Sum
measures.description: Sum of print preprinted value.

measures.name: InternetPreprintedValue_Sum
measures.description: Sum of internet preprinted value.

measures.name: MultimediaPreprintedValue_Sum
measures.description: Sum of multimedia preprinted value.

measures.name: CountHasOnline
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasOnline = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of items that are flagged HasOnline = true.

measures.name: DistinctHigherSpendingHeadingCount
measures.description: Number of distinct HigherSpendingHeadingID values present.

measures.name: MaxLastSaleAssignmentDate
measures.description: Most recent LastSaleAssignmentDate for items in the selection.

measures.name: AvgSubscriptionValue
measures.description: Average subscription value per item.

notes: Currency fields are assumed to be EUR based on dataset locale; please validate with source system.

Many year-prefixed columns (Y01..Y12) represent periodized contract values â€” use the per-group totals (TotalPBDContractsValue, TotalPADContractsValue, TotalIBDContractsValue, TotalIADContractsValue) for summarized reporting.
Boolean columns (BIT) are exposed via COUNT/SUM(CASE ...) measures (e.g., CountHasOnline). Additional boolean counts can be added on request.

measures.name: RangeCount
measures.description: Number of price range rows (distinct ranges) in this table

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts charged for all price ranges

measures.name: AverageOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Average one-time amount across price ranges

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Lowest starting price (PriceFrom) across ranges

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Highest upper bound (PriceTo) across ranges; null indicates open-ended ranges

measures.name: AverageRangeWidth
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NOT NULL THEN PriceTo - PriceFrom ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average width of the price range (PriceTo - PriceFrom) for closed ranges

measures.name: AverageExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Average extra fee percentage applied for the ranges

measures.name: OpenEndedRangesCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of ranges where PriceTo is null (open-ended / no upper limit)

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Total number of discount policy item records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctDiscountPolicyCount
measures.description: Number of distinct discount policies referenced by these items.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount values defined on items. Source currency must be interpreted from the transactional system.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average Amount across items where Amount is present.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum Amount value among items.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum Amount value among items.

measures.name: AveragePercentage
measures.description: Average Percentage value defined on items (e.g., discount percent).

measures.name: MinPercentage
measures.description: Minimum Percentage value among items.

measures.name: MaxPercentage
measures.description: Maximum Percentage value among items.

measures.name: AverageRangeWidth
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN RangeUpLimit IS NOT NULL AND RangeDownLimit IS NOT NULL THEN RangeUpLimit - RangeDownLimit ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average width of the defined ranges (RangeUpLimit - RangeDownLimit) for items where both limits are present.

measures.name: EnabledItemCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EnableLimit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items considered enabled (EnableLimit = 1). Interpretation of EnableLimit should be validated against source semantics.

measures.name: ItemsWithAmountDefined
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Amount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of items that have an Amount value populated.

default_filters.description: Show enabled items by default (assumes 1 = enabled). Validate with source system.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of discount policy item rows

measures.name: TotalDiscountAmount
measures.description: Sum of explicit discount amounts defined on these policy items (if Amount is populated). Currency of Amount is not specified in the table and should be interpreted according to business rules or a related dimension.

measures.name: AverageDiscountAmount
measures.description: Average discount amount per policy item (nulls ignored).

measures.name: TotalDiscountPercentage
measures.description: Sum of percentage values across policy items. Use with care â€” percentages are additive only in specific business contexts.

measures.name: AverageDiscountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage discount across policy items (nulls ignored).

measures.name: MinRangeDownLimit
measures.description: Lowest lower bound (RangeDownLimit) across the selected policy items.

measures.name: MaxRangeUpLimit
measures.description: Highest upper bound (RangeUpLimit) across the selected policy items.

measures.name: EnabledLimitCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EnableLimit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of policy items where the limit is enabled (EnableLimit = 1).

measures.name: DistinctDmTableCount
measures.description: Number of distinct DMTable values referenced by these policy items.

default_filters.description: Show only items with enabled limits by default

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (one row per targeted business point / customer item)

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points targeted in the dataset

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign owners / assigned salesmen

measures.name: DistinctActionSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen who performed actions (visits / callbacks)

measures.name: ActionsCount
measures.description: Count of recorded actions (rows with a non-null ActionDateTime)

measures.name: ContactableCount
measures.description: Number of rows with a phone number recorded (contactable records)

measures.name: ContactableRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(Phone) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of rows that have a phone number recorded (contactable / total rows)

measures.name: FirstActionDate
measures.description: Earliest recorded action date in the current context

measures.name: LastActionDate
measures.description: Most recent recorded action date in the current context

measures.name: DaysSinceLastAction
measures.description: Number of days between the most recent action and today (uses GETDATE()). Null/undefined if no actions in scope.

foreign_keys.note: inferred â€” links action performer to user table
inferred â€” business point / location master

default_filters.description: Exclude rows without an action date by default to focus on executed interactions

display.notes: CampaignDescription and BusinessPoint fields are useful default dimensions. Status column appears to be empty in sample data.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of records / assignments in this table (one row per ID).

measures.name: UniqueCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (BusinessPointID) targeted or assigned in the dataset.

measures.name: UniqueSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen referenced in the dataset.

measures.name: UniqueRules
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign rules represented.

measures.name: UniqueCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns present in the data.

measures.name: AvgCustomersPerSalesman
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) END
measures.description: Average number of distinct customers (BusinessPointID) per salesman across the evaluated set.

measures.name: RowsShareOfTotal
measures.description: Share of total rows represented by the current aggregation context (percent of table rows).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows in the detail file (one row per business point / line)

measures.name: Unique Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the file

measures.name: Total Print Amount
measures.description: Sum of the PrintAmount values from the upload file (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Total PPC Amount
measures.description: Sum of PPC (pay-per-click) amounts from the upload file (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Total XOGR Amount
measures.description: Sum of XOGR amounts from the upload file (primary monetary component in sample data)

measures.name: Total Website Amount
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount values from the upload file (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Total Amount (All Channels)
measures.description: Aggregate of the reported TotalAmount per row. Should equal the sum of component amounts when components are present

measures.name: Average Total Amount per Row
measures.description: Average of TotalAmount across rows (nulls excluded from average)

measures.name: Rows with Any Amount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(PrintAmount, PPCAmount, XOGRAmount, WebSiteAmount, TotalAmount) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that contain at least one monetary value in any of the amount columns

measures.name: Percent Rows with Any Amount
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(PrintAmount, PPCAmount, XOGRAmount, WebSiteAmount, TotalAmount) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of rows that include at least one monetary amount (percentage of total rows)

measures.name: Targeted Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows in the fact (each row represents a campaign x target item x business point instance).

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of unique business points targeted by the campaign/segment combination.

measures.name: Signed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targeted rows that have a non-null SignedDate (indicates a signed/converted record).

measures.name: Signed Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Proportion of targeted rows that resulted in a sign (SignedCount / TargetedRowCount).

measures.name: Total Subscription Discounts (Subr)
measures.description: Sum of subscription discounts applied to targeted rows (SubrTotalAmountDiscount).

measures.name: Total Non-Subscription Discounts (NoSubr)
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription discounts applied to targeted rows (NoSubrTotalAmountDiscounts).

measures.name: Total Renewal Amount
measures.description: Total renewal amounts associated with the targeted rows (RenewalTotalAmount).

measures.name: Average Subscription Discount per Row
measures.description: Average subscription discount across rows (ignores nulls). Useful to understand mean discount exposure.

measures.name: Payment Refusal Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targeted rows flagged with a payment refusal.

measures.name: Payment Refusal Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of targeted rows with payment refusal.

measures.name: Released Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targeted rows that have been marked as released.

measures.name: Released Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of targeted rows that are released.

measures.name: Bundle Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows marked as part of a bundle.

measures.name: Disappeared Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of targeted rows flagged as disappeared (business point no longer present).

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of business points (rows) in the current filter context

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Distinct business points (unique BusinessPointID)

measures.name: PhoneAvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points that have a primary Phone value

measures.name: PctWithPhone
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(BusinessPointID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points that have a primary Phone value

measures.name: AvgPhoneNumbersPerBusinessPoint
measures.expression: AVG( (CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone1)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone4 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone4)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone5 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone5)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) )
measures.description: Average number of non-empty phone numbers (Phone + Phone1..Phone5) per business point

measures.name: TotalPreprintedAdValue
measures.description: Sum of preprinted ad values (Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue). Source column hints USD in sample statistics.

measures.name: TotalSubscriptionValue
measures.description: Sum of subscription values. Values are zero in sample data; currency not specified in source metadata.

measures.name: LossPrintedNewTotal
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew across the selected scope

measures.name: DistinctSubchannelCount
measures.description: Number of distinct SubchannelID values present in the filtered set

measures.name: LatestLastSignedDate
measures.description: Most recent LastSignedDate for the selected business points

measures.name: PhoneM11Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points where PhoneM11 flag is true

measures.name: Phone1M11Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points where Phone1M11 flag is true

measures.name: Phone2M11Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone2M11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points where Phone2M11 flag is true

measures.name: ScoredBusinessPoints
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Score IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Score)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points with a non-empty Score value

measures.name: ReliabilityStatusGreenCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'GREEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points flagged as GREEN in ReliabilityStatus

measures.name: TaskRowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (task instances) in the view

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of unique tasks (distinct TaskID)

measures.name: SumLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew flag values across rows (total printed-loss indicators)

measures.name: AvgLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Average LossPrintedNew value per row

measures.name: PctRowsWithLossPrinted
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LossPrintedNew > 0 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of rows where LossPrintedNew is greater than zero

measures.name: AvgCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days (CampStartedOn â†’ CampClosedOn)

measures.name: AvgTaskActiveDays
measures.description: Average inclusive number of days a task is scheduled active (StartDate â†’ EndDate)

measures.name: TasksWithAssignedOwner
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have an ActualOwnerID (assigned owner)

measures.name: DistinctBrandCount
measures.description: Count of distinct Brandname values represented in the view

measures.name: TasksWithPhoneCount
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that include at least one non-empty phone value (contact available)

measures.name: LastSalesAssignmentDate
measures.description: Most recent start date of the sales assignment for the business point.

measures.name: DaysSinceLastSalesAssignment
measures.description: Number of days elapsed since the most recent sales assignment start date. Null-safe when StartDate is NULL.

measures.name: AssignedRecordCount
measures.description: Count of records for the business point in this view (typically 1 per BusinessPointID).

measures.name: AssignedWithinLast12MonthsFlag
measures.expression: CASE WHEN MAX(StartDate) >= DATEADD(month, -12, GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
measures.description: Flag indicating whether the business point has a sales assignment start date within the last 12 months.

measures.name: CompletedAnalysisCount
measures.description: Number of completed market analysis records (row count).

measures.name: TotalTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of target values for completed analyses. Source column has DECIMAL(38,3); currency is not specified in the source and should be set if a canonical currency is known.

measures.name: TotalTargetCount
measures.description: Sum of target counts across completed analyses.

measures.name: AverageCustomerRating
measures.description: Average customer rating for completed analyses (scale depends on source data).

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the completed analyses.

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartDate and EndDate for completed analyses. Nulls in start/end dates are ignored by the AVG aggregation.

measures.name: TargetValuePerCount
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TargetCount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TargetValue) / SUM(TargetCount) END
measures.description: Average target value per target count (total target value divided by total target count). Returns NULL when total target count is zero.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the campaign associated with the completed analysis (assumed).
Reference to the owner/analyst who completed the analysis (assumed as employee/person key).
Reference to the unit/organizational unit associated with the analysis (assumed).

measures.name: TargetValue
measures.description: Sum of target monetary values for the campaign/unit over the specified period. The source view does not include an explicit currency code; currency is not tracked at the row level.

measures.name: TargetCount
measures.description: Sum of target counts (units, objects or targets) for the campaign/unit over the specified period.

measures.name: AvgDailyTargetValue
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN ToDate >= FromDate THEN DATEDIFF(day, FromDate, ToDate) + 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN SUM(TargetValue) / SUM(CASE WHEN ToDate >= FromDate THEN DATEDIFF(day, FromDate, ToDate) + 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE NULL END
measures.description: Average target monetary value per day across the period (TargetValue divided by number of days in the FromDate-ToDate range). Returns NULL if the date range is invalid or zero-length.

measures.name: AvgDailyTargetCount
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN ToDate >= FromDate THEN DATEDIFF(day, FromDate, ToDate) + 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN SUM(TargetCount) / SUM(CASE WHEN ToDate >= FromDate THEN DATEDIFF(day, FromDate, ToDate) + 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE NULL END
measures.description: Average target count per day across the period (TargetCount divided by number of days in the FromDate-ToDate range). Returns NULL if the date range is invalid or zero-length.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of pending market-analysis records (row count)

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the pending set

measures.name: AvgCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration of campaigns (EndDate - StartDate) in days

measures.name: MinCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Shortest campaign duration (in days) among pending records

measures.name: MaxCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Longest campaign duration (in days) among pending records

measures.name: CurrentlyActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN GETDATE() BETWEEN StartDate AND EndDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records for which the current date falls between StartDate and EndDate (active/pending now)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (campaign instances) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctUnitCount
measures.description: Number of distinct units associated with campaigns.

measures.name: DistinctOwnerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct owners (actual owners) associated with campaigns.

measures.name: TotalCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Total sum of campaign durations in days across all rows. Uses DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, EndDate).

measures.name: AverageCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days (average of DATEDIFF(day, StartDate, EndDate)).

measures.name: MinCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Minimum campaign duration in days.

measures.name: MaxCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Maximum campaign duration in days.

measures.name: CampaignsPerUnit
measures.description: Average number of campaign rows per unit (total rows divided by distinct unit count). Null-safe.

foreign_keys.description: References campaign dimension.
References owner dimension (user/employee responsible).
References unit dimension (organizational or market unit).
